<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="content_block_programmatic"><content_block_programmatic action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><category>general</category><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><frame/><logged_on>false</logged_on><name>Software_Solution_DCEG_RRS_Home</name><programmatic_content><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<g:include_script src="angularjs.min.1.4.9.js.jsdbx"/>
	<g:include_script src="jqueryCDN.jsdbx"/>	
	<g:include_script src="dirPagination.jsdbx"/>
	<g:include_script src="bootstrapCDN.jsdbx"/>
	<g:include_script src="typeahead.bundle.jsdbx"/>
	<g2:requires name="userPrediction.jsdbx"/>
	<g2:requires name="locationPrediction.jsdbx"/>
	<g2:requires name="cms_catalog_functions.jsdbx"/>
	<g2:requires name="cms_typeahead_functions.jsdbx"/>
	<g:include_script src="jquery.min.jsdbx"/>
	<g:include_script src="jquery.ui.jsdbx"/>
	<g:evaluate var="jvar_my_sys_id" expression="gs.getUserID()"/>
	<g:evaluate var="jvar_record_sys_id" expression="RP.getParameterValue('sys_id')"/>
	<g2:cms_modals/>
	<g2:cms_header/>
	<g:evaluate> var g_ck = gs.getSessionToken(); </g:evaluate>
	
	<script>
	var itemIdArray = {};	
	var applicationName = "BROP";
	var cat_item_desc = "DCEG Resource Requisition Application";
	var cat_item_id='';	
	var names = ["name", "requestDate", "projectName", "casCode", "projectId", "trcNumber", "needDate", "requestDescription", "technologyNeed", "whereRun", "otherPlace", "whereStore", "size", "fileFormat", "listDeliverables", "listCollaborators", "imputation", "hpvAnalysis", "matrix", "gwas", "predixan", "ase", "rnaseq", "gwasEnrich", "idsc", "vcf", "pencnv", "gcta", "otherTask", "otherTaskValue", "explanation"];
	var textFields = ["name", "requestDate", "projectName", "casCode", "projectId", "trcNumber", "needDate", "requestDescription", "technologyNeed", "whereRun", "otherPlace", "whereStore", "size", "fileFormat", "listDeliverables", "listCollaborators", "otherTaskValue", "explanation"];
	var checkboxs = ["imputation", "hpvAnalysis", "matrix", "gwas", "predixan", "ase", "rnaseq", "gwasEnrich", "idsc", "vcf", "pencnv", "gcta", "otherTask"];
	var bioMemberOption="";
		
	jQuery(document).ready(function($){	
		history.pushState(null, null, '');
		window.addEventListener('popstate', function(event) {
						history.pushState(null, null, '');
		});
		$("#requestDate").datepicker();
		$("#needDate").datepicker();
		if(isDCEGPI() || isDCEGCommittee() || isDCEGChair()){
			$('#submitterSpan').show();
		}else{
			$('#submitterSpan').hide();
		}
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "GET",
		  url: "/api/naci/getdata/getCatItemId",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: {name: cat_item_desc},
		  async: false,
		  success: function(data){
			  cat_item_id=data.result[0].id; 
		  },
		  error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
		  }
		});		
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "GET",
		  url: "/api/naci/getdata/getVariableArray",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: {email: 'zhoujim@nih.gov'},
		  async: false,
		  success: function(data){
			  itemIdArray = data.result[0].itemId;
		  },
		  error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
		  }
		});	
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "GET",
		  url: "/api/naci/getdata/getBioinformaticianGroupMember",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  async: false,
		  success: function(data){
		      bioMemberOption = data.result[0].option;
		  },
		  error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
		  }
		});			
		
		showSubmitButton();
	});
	
	angular.module('saveRequestTable', ['angularUtils.directives.dirPagination']);
	angular.module('saveRequestTable').controller('saveTableControl', function($scope, $http){ 
		$scope.myData = [];
		$('#saved_table').hide(); 
		if(isDCEGPI()){
			$.ajax({
			  dataType: "json",
			  type: "GET",
			  url: "/api/naci/getdata/getSavedRequest",
			  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
			  data: {userid:'${jvar_my_sys_id}', appName: applicationName},
			  success: function(data){
				  $scope.myData=data.result.slice(0); 
				  $scope.count = data.result.length;
				  if( data.result.length == 0){
					  $('#saved_table').hide();  
				  }else{
					  $('#saved_table').show();  
				  }
				  $scope.$apply();   
			  },
			  error: function(data){
					alert("ERROR");
			  }
		   });
	   }
	   $scope.listDetails = function(id1){
			loadSavedDetails(id1);
		    $scope.$apply(); 
	   }
	   $scope.removeItem = function(id){
		    loadDeleteSaveConfirm(id);
			$scope.$apply();
	   }
	   $scope.sort=function(keyname){
	 	  $scope.sortKey = keyname;
	 	  $scope.reverse = !$scope.reverse;
	   }	
	});
	               	
	angular.module('saveRequestTable').controller('piSubmittedControl', function($scope, $http){ 
		$scope.myData = [];
		$('#submitted_table').hide(); 
		if(isDCEGPI() || isDCEGCommittee() || isDCEGChair()){
			$.ajax({
			  dataType: "json",
			  type: "GET",
			  url: "/api/naci/getdata/getSubmittedRequestData",
			  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
			  data: {userid:'${jvar_my_sys_id}', desc: cat_item_desc},
			  success: function(data){
				  $scope.myData=data.result; 
				  $scope.count = data.result.length;
				  if( data.result.length == 0){
					  $('#submitted_table').hide();  
				  }else{
					  $('#submitted_table').show();  
				  }
				  $scope.$apply();   
			  },
			  error: function(data){
					alert("ERROR");
			  }
			});
		}
		$scope.displayDetails = function(id){
		     showActionButton('pi');
			 loadRequestDetails(id);
		     $scope.$apply(); 
	   }
		
       $scope.withdrawItem = function(id){
			loadWithdrawRequestConfirm(id);
		    $scope.$apply(); 
	   }
       $scope.resubmitProposal = function(id, ticketNum){
		    loadResubmitDetail(id, ticketNum); 
		    $scope.$apply(); 
	   }
	   $scope.sort=function(keyname){
	 	  $scope.sortKey = keyname;
	 	  $scope.reverse = !$scope.reverse;
	   }		
	});

    // secretary table  
	angular.module('saveRequestTable').controller('secretaryViewControl', function($scope, $http){ 
		$scope.myData = [];

		$('#secretary_init_table').hide();
		if(isDCEGSecretary()){

			  url: "/api/naci/getdata/getRequestDataThroughApproverTable",
			  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
			  data: {type: method, catDesc: cat_item_desc, userId: '${jvar_my_sys_id}'},
			  success: function(data){
				  $scope.myData=data.result; 
				  $scope.count = data.result.length;
				  if( data.result.length == 0){
					  $('#secretary_init_table').hide();

					  $('#secretary_init_table').show();  
				  }
				  $scope.$apply();   
			  },
			  error: function(data){
					alert("ERROR");
			  }
			});		
		}
		$scope.displayDetails = function(id, approvalId){
			 showActionButton('secretary');
		     loadRequestDetails(id, approvalId);
 		     $scope.$apply(); 
	   }		
	   $scope.sort=function(keyname){
	 	  $scope.sortKey = keyname;
	 	  $scope.reverse = !$scope.reverse;
	   }		
		
	});
    //there will be more tables for secretary

	angular.module('saveRequestTable').controller('chairmanReviewedControl', function($scope, $http){ 
		$scope.myData = [];
		$('#chairman_reviewed_table').hide();
		var method = "chairmanReviewed";
		if(isDCEGChair()){
			$.ajax({
			  dataType: "json",
			  type: "GET",
			  url: "/api/naci/getdata/getRequestDataThroughApproverTable",
			  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
			  data: {type: method, catDesc: cat_item_desc, userId: '${jvar_my_sys_id}'},
			  success: function(data){
				  $scope.myData=data.result; 
				  $scope.count = data.result.length;
				  if( data.result.length == 0){
					  $('#chairman_reviewed_table').hide();  
				  }else{
					  $('#chairman_reviewed_table').show();  
				  }
				  $scope.$apply();   
			  },
			  error: function(data){
					alert("ERROR");
			  }
			});		
		}
		$scope.displayDetails = function(id, id2){
			  showActionButton('pi');
		      loadRequestDetails(id, id2);
 		     $scope.$apply(); 
	   }		
	   $scope.sort=function(keyname){
	 	  $scope.sortKey = keyname;
	 	  $scope.reverse = !$scope.reverse;
	   }		
	});

	function callWithdrawRequest(){
	    //get all data detail 
		var variables = [{}];
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "GET",
		  url: "/api/naci/getdata/getRequestDetailsById",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: {sysId: recId},
		  async: false,
		  success: function(data){
		      var obj = data.result[0];
		      for(var i = 0; i < names.length; i++){
		         var value = obj[names[i]];
				 variables[0][names[i]] = value;		
			  }	
		      var comments = obj['comments'];
			  variables[0]['comments'] = comments;
		  },
		  error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
		  }
		});		
		
		variables[0].user_id = "${jvar_my_sys_id}";
		variables[0].applicationName = applicationName;	
		variables[0].action = 'add';
		var param = JSON.stringify(variables);
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "POST",
		  contentType: "application/json",
		  url: "/api/naci/processdata/savedata",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: param,
          async: false,
		  success: function(data){
		       window.location.reload(true); 
		  },
		  error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
	      }
		});
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "GET",
		  url: "/api/naci/processdata/withdrawRequest",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: {sysId: recId},
		  async: false,
		  success: function(data){
	           closeRequestConfirm();
		       window.location.reload(true);
		  },
		  error: function(data){
				alert(data);
		  }
		});		
	}
		
    function loadRequestDetails(id, id2){
		$('#commentLength').val('0');
		cleanApprovalError();
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "GET",
		  url: "/api/naci/getdata/getRequestDetailsById",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: {sysId: id},
		  async: false,
		  success: function(data){
		      var obj = data.result[0];
		      for(var i = 0; i < textFields.length; i++){
		         var value = obj[textFields[i]];
				 if(textFields[i].indexOf('Date') > 0){
					value = getConvertedValue(value, "1"); 
				 }
				 $('#'+textFields[i]+"1").html(value);	
			  }	
			  for(var k = 0; k 	< checkboxs.length; k++){
				 var value = obj[checkboxs[k]];
				 if(value == 'true'){
					 $('#' + checkboxs[k] + "1").prop('checked', 'cheked');
				 }
			  }
		      $('#hideRequestId').val(id); 
		      $('#hideApprovalId').val(id2);  //approve, reject or fast track action will use this id for further process.
		      var comments = obj['comments'];
			  $('#commentLength').val(comments.length);
			  if(comments != null && comments.length > 5){
					comments = parse(comments);
		            $('#commentReviewId1').html(comments);
			  }else{
					$('#commets').hide();
		      }
	
			  $('#proposalDetail').modal('show');

		},
		  error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
		  }
		});		
	}
		
	function parse(allcomments) {

		 var comments = allcomments.split("ENDCOMMENTS");
		 var commentsblock = '<table class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed" width="100%"><tr><th>Role</th><th>Approver</th><th>Approval Status</th><th>Comments</th><th>Time</th></tr>'
		 for(i = 0; i < comments .length; i++){
			 if (comments[i].length > 40) { 
			   if (comments[i][0] == '\n') {
				   var lastI = 0;
				   while (lastI < comments[i].length && comments[i][lastI] == '\n') 
						lastI ++;
				   comments[i] = comments[i].substring(lastI,comments[i].length);
			   }
			   var t = comments[i].substring(0,22);
			   var approver = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(ENDROLE)')+9,comments[i].length);
			   var results = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 57,comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 65);
			   var comm= comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 66, comments[i].indexOf('(role)'));
			   var role = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(role)') + 6, comments[i].indexOf('(ENDROLE)')); 
			   commentsblock = commentsblock + "<tr>";
			   commentsblock = commentsblock + "<td>" + role + "</td>";
			   commentsblock = commentsblock + "<td>" + approver + "</td>";
			   if(results == 'approved'){
				   results = "Recommend to Approve"; 
			   }else if(results == 'rejected'){
				   results = "Recommend to Revise";
			   }else{
				  results = "Unknown Action";
			   }
			   commentsblock = commentsblock + "<td>" + results+ "</td>";
			   commentsblock = commentsblock + "<td>" + comm + "</td>";
			   commentsblock = commentsblock + "<td>" + t + "</td>";
			   commentsblock = commentsblock + "</tr>";
			 }
		 }
		 commentsblock = commentsblock + "</table>";

	return commentsblock;
	}

	var recId = '';	
	function loadSavedDetails(id){
		clearForm();
		$('#resubmit').hide();
		$('#submit').show();
		$('#save').show();
		getSavedRequestById(id);
	}
		
	function getSavedRequestById(id){
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "GET",
		  url: "/api/naci/getdata/getDataById",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: {savedId: id},
		  success: function(data){
			    var variables = data.result[0].variable;
				for(key in variables){
					if(textFields.indexOf(key) > -1){
						if(key == 'requestDate' || key == 'needDate'){
							 $('#'+key).val(getConvertedValue(variables[key], 1));
						}else{
							$('#'+key).val(variables[key]);
							if(key == 'whereRun'){
								if(variables[key] == 'other'){	
									$('#otherPlace').show();
								}else{
									$('#otherPlace').hide();
								}
							}
						}
					}else{
						if(variables[key] == 'true'){
							$('#'+key).prop('checked', true);
							if(key == 'otherTask'){
								$('#otherTaskValue').prop('disabled', false);
							}
						}else{
							$('#'+key).prop('checked', false);
						}
					}
				}
				$('#hideValue').val(id);
				$('#newProposal').modal('show');
		  },
		  error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
	      }
		});		
	}

	function callSecretaryUpdateApproval(){
		cleanApprovalError();
		if(updateValidation()){
		    showApprovalError();
		}else{
			var comments = $('#commentsText').val();
			var id = $('#hideRequestId').val();
			var approvalId = $('#hideApprovalId').val();
			var user = approver;
			var user_id = '${jvar_my_sys_id}';
			var act = action;
			var variables ={};
			variables['requestId'] = id;
			variables['approvalId'] = approvalId;
			variables['role'] = user;
			variables['action'] = act;
			variables['comment'] = comments;
			variables['userId'] = user_id;
			variables['isFastTrack'] = isFastTrack;
			var selectedBio = $('#bioMemberList').val();
			if(selectedBio != null && selectedBio != "0" && selectedBio.length > 5){
				variables['bioId'] =  selectedBio;
			}else{
				variables['bioId'] =  "0";
			}
			var estimateHour = $('#estimateHour').val();
			if(estimateHour != null && estimateHour != "0" && estimateHour.length > 0){
				variables['estimate'] =  estimateHour;
				variables['comment'] = 'Analysis in Progress';
			}else{
				variables['esitmate'] =  "0";
			}
			var actualHour = $('#actualHour').val();
			if(actualHour != null && actualHour != "0" && actualHour.length > 0){
				variables['actualHour'] =  actualHour;
				variables['comment'] = 'Complete Analysis';
			}else{
				variables['actualHour'] =  "0";
			}		
			var param = JSON.stringify(variables);
		 	$.ajax({
			  dataType: "json",
			  contentType: "application/json",
			  type: "POST",
			  url: "/api/naci/processdata/approvalUpdate",
			  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
			  data: param,
			  success: function(data){
				  //alert(data.result[0].message);
				   window.location.reload(true);
				  $('#confirmationDiv').modal('hide');
			  },
			  error: function(data){
					alert("ERROR");
			  }
			});		
	   }
	}
	
	function updateValidation(){
		var error = false;
		if(checkTextarea == "1"){
			if(($('#commentsText').val().trim()).length == 0){
				error = true; //true means there is an error
			}
		}
		if(checkList == "1"){
			if($('#bioMemberList').val() == "0"){
				error = true;
			}
		}
		if(checkText == "1"){
		  if(hourType == "estimate"){
			  if($('#estimateHour').val().trim().length == 0){
				  error = true;
			  }
		  }
		  if(hourType == "actual"){
		 	 if($('#actualHour').val().trim().length == 0){
			   error = true;
		     }
		  }
		}
		
		return error;
	}
	function showApprovalError(){
		var message1 = "Please fill in data into the highlighted area.";
		var message2 = "Please select an Bioinformatician";
		
		if(checkTextarea == "1"){
			if($('#commentsText').val().trim().length == 0){
				$('#errMsg').html('<font color="red">'+message1+'</font>');
				$('#commentsText').css("background-color", "yellow");
			}
		}
		if(checkList == "1"){
			if($('#bioMemberList').val() == "0"){
				$('#errMsg').html('<font color="red">'+message2+'</font>');
				$('#bioMemberList').css("background-color", "yellow");
			}
		}
		if(checkTextarea == "1" && checkList == "1"){
			if(	$('#commentsText').val().trim().length == 0  && $('#bioMemberList').val() == "0"){
				$('#errMsg').html('<div><font color="red">'+message1+'</font></div><div><font color="red">'+message2+'</font></div>');
			}
		}
		if(checkText == "1"){
			if($('#estimateHour').val().trim().length == 0 || $('#actualHour').val().trim().length == 0){
				$('#errMsg').html('<font color="red">'+message1+'</font>');
				$('#actualHour').css("background-color", "yellow");
				$('#estimateHour').css("background-color", "yellow");
			}
		}
	    $('#errMsg').show();
		moveToApprovalTop()
		closeRequestConfirm();
	}
	function cleanApprovalError(){
			$('#errMsg').html('');
		    $('#commentsText').css("background-color", "");
		    $('#bioMemberList').css("background-color", "");
			$('#actualHour').css("background-color", "");
		    $('#estimateHour').css("background-color", "");
	}
	function loadDeleteSaveConfirm(rid){
		$('#confirmMessage').html("<br/><b>Are you sure you want to delete this draft?</b><br/>");
		recId = rid;
		removeAllListener();
		document.getElementById('submitAction').addEventListener("click", callDeleteSave, false);
		$('#confirmationDiv').modal('show');
	}
	function loadWithdrawRequestConfirm(rid){
		$('#confirmMessage').html("<br/><b>Are you sure you want to withdraw this request?</b><br/>");
		recId = rid;
		removeAllListener();
		document.getElementById('submitAction').addEventListener("click", callWithdrawRequest, false);
		$('#confirmationDiv').modal('show');
	}
	function loadResubmitConfirm(){ 
		$('#confirmMessage').html("<br/><b>Are you sure you want to resubmit this request?</b><br/>");
		removeAllListener();
		document.getElementById('submitAction').addEventListener("click", callResubmitRequest, false);
		$('#confirmationDiv').modal('show');		
	}		
	function removeAllListener() {
	   //remove all added event listener (very important!)
		document.getElementById('submitAction').removeEventListener("click", callDeleteSave, false);
		document.getElementById('submitAction').removeEventListener("click", callWithdrawRequest, false);
		document.getElementById('submitAction').removeEventListener("click", callSecretaryUpdateApproval, false);
		document.getElementById('submitAction').removeEventListener("click", callResubmitRequest, false);
		document.getElementById('submitAction').removeEventListener("click", submitRequest, false);
	} 		

	function callResubmitRequest(){ 
	    closeRequestConfirm();	
		resubmit();
	}
	function callDeleteSave(){
		var variables =getDeleteParam();
	    var param = JSON.stringify(variables);
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "POST",
		  contentType: "application/json",
		  url: "/api/naci/processdata/savedata",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: param,
		  success: function(data){
		       closeRequestConfirm();
		       window.location.reload(true);
		  },
		  error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
	      }
		});	
	}
		
	function loadResubmitDetail(id, ticketNum){
		$('#commentLength').val('0');
		cleanApprovalError();		
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "GET",
		  url: "/api/naci/getdata/getRequestDetailsById",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: {sysId: id},
		  async: false,
		  success: function(data){
		      var obj = data.result[0];
		      for(var i = 0; i < textFields.length; i++){
		         var value = obj[textFields[i]];
				 if(textFields[i].indexOf('Date') > 0){
					value = getConvertedValue(value, "1");
				 }
				 $('#'+textFields[i]).val(value);		
			  }	
			  for(var k = 0; k 	< checkboxs.length; k++){
				 var value = obj[checkboxs[k]];
				 if(value == 'true'){
					 $('#' + checkboxs[k]).prop('checked', 'cheked');
				 }
			  }
		      $('#hideRequestId').val(id); 
		      var comments = obj['comments'];
			  $('#hideComments').val(comments);
		      $('#hideTicketNum').val(ticketNum); 
		      $('#save').hide();  
		      $('#submit').hide();
		      $('#resubmit').show();
			  $('#newProposal').modal('show');
		  },
		  error: function(data){
		     alert("ERROR");
		  } 
	    });
	}
	function getDeleteParam(){
		var variables ={};
		variables['action'] = 'delete';
		variables['user_id'] = "${jvar_my_sys_id}";
		variables['applicationName'] = applicationName;
		variables['savedId'] = recId;
		
		return [variables];
	}
		
	function deleteSavedData(){
		var variables = prepareParam();
		var param = JSON.stringify(variables);
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "POST",
		  contentType: "application/json",
		  url: "/api/naci/processdata/savedata",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: param,
		  success: function(data){
			 window.location.reload(true);
		  },
		  error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
	      }
		});		
	}		
	function prepareParam(){
		var variables ={};
		variables['action'] = 'delete';
		variables['user_id'] = "${jvar_my_sys_id}";
		variables['applicationName'] = applicationName;
		variables['savedId'] = $('#hideValue').val();
		
		return [variables];	
	}
		
	function logout(){
	   window.location.href="/logout.do";
	}
	
	function newProposal(){
		clearForm();
		clearError();
		enableButtons();
		$('#hideValue').val('none');
		$('#newProposal').modal('show');
	}
		
	function closeWin(){
		$('#newProposal').modal('hide');
	}
	function closeDetailPage(){
		$('#proposalDetail').modal('hide');
	}
	function closeRequestConfirm(){
	    $('#confirmationDiv').modal('hide');
		$('#confirmationDiv').on('hidden.bs.modal', function (e) {
			$('body').addClass('modal-open');
		});		
	}	
	function valueChange(){
   		var location = $('#whereRun').val();
   		if(location == 'other'){
   			$('#otherPlace').show();
   		}else{
		    $('#otherPlace').val('');
   			$('#otherPlace').hide();
   		}
   }	
    function otherTaskChange(){
   		if($('#otherTask').is(':checked')){
   			$('#otherTaskValue').prop('disabled', false);
   		}else{
   			$('#otherTaskValue').val(' ');
   			$('#otherTaskValue').prop('disabled', true);
   		}
    }
		
	function disableButtons(){
		$('#submit').attr('disabled', 'disabled');
		$('#save').attr('disabled', 'disabled');
		$('#cancel').attr('disabled', 'disabled');
	}
		
	function enableButtons(){
		$('#submit').removeAttr('disabled');
		$('#save').removeAttr('disabled', 'disabled');
		$('#save').show();
		$('#submit').show();
		$('#resubmit').hide();
		$('#cancel').removeAttr('disabled', 'disabled');
	}
	
	function resubmit(){
		var trackData = {};
		clearError();
        var variables = getProposalData();
		var error = validateTextField(variables[0]);
		var error1 = validateCheckbox(variables[0]);
		if(error.length > 0 || error1.length > 0){
			if(error.length > 0){
				showError(error);
			}
			if(error1.length > 0){
				showError(error1);
			}
			closeRequestConfirm();
			moveToTop();
		}else{	
		    var requestId =  $('#hideRequestId').val();;
		    var ticketNumber = $('#hideTicketNum').val();
		    trackData['requestId'] = requestId;
		    trackData['ticker_num'] = ticketNumber;
			var param = JSON.stringify(trackData);
			$.ajax({
			  dataType: "json",
			  type: "POST",
			  contentType: "application/json",
			  url: "/api/naci/processdata/processTrackData",
			  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
			  data: param,
			  async: false,
			  success: function(data){
				resubmitData(requestId);
			  },
			  error: function(data){
					alert("ERROR");
			  }
			});						
		}
		
	}	
	
	function resubmitData(orgin_req_id){
		var variables = getProposalData();
		var currentDate = new Date().toLocaleDateString();
		variables[0].requestDate = getConvertedValue(currentDate, 0);
		variables[0].requested_for = "${jvar_my_sys_id}";
		variables[0].opened_by = "${jvar_my_sys_id}";
		variables[0].cat_item = cat_item_id;
		variables[0].short_description ="DCEG Resource requisition System - BROP";
		variables[0].contact_type=orgin_req_id.toString(); 
		variables[0].variables = itemIdArray;
		var preComments = $('#hideComments').val();
		if(preComments.length >= 50){
			var index = preComments.indexOf('Added comment to Approval record:');
		    preComments = preComments.substring(index);
		}
		variables[0].comments = preComments; 
		var param = JSON.stringify(variables);
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "POST",
		  contentType: "application/json",
		  url: "/api/naci/processdata/submitRequestData",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: param,
		  success: function(data){
		     window.location.reload(true);
		  },
		  error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
		  }
		});				
	}
		
	function submitRequest(){
		clearError();
		var variables = getProposalData();
		var currentDate = new Date().toLocaleDateString();
		variables[0].requestDate = getConvertedValue(currentDate, 0);
		var error = validateTextField(variables[0]);
		var error1 = validateCheckbox(variables[0]);
		if(error.length > 0 || error1.length > 0){
			if(error.length > 0){
				showError(error);
			}
			if(error1.length > 0){
				showError(error1);
			}
			closeRequestConfirm();
			moveToTop();
		}else{
			disableButtons();
			variables[0].requested_for = "${jvar_my_sys_id}";
			variables[0].opened_by = "${jvar_my_sys_id}";
			variables[0].cat_item = cat_item_id;
			variables[0].short_description ="DCEG Resource requisition System - BROP";
			variables[0].contact_type="Web";
			variables[0].variables = itemIdArray;
			var param = JSON.stringify(variables);
			$.ajax({
			  dataType: "json",
			  type: "POST",
			  contentType: "application/json",
			  url: "/api/naci/processdata/submitRequestData",
			  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
			  data: param,
			  success: function(data){
		        var hideValue = $('#hideValue').val();
				if(hideValue != null  && hideValue.trim() != ''  && hideValue != "none"){
					deleteSavedData();
				}else{
				 window.location.reload(true);
				}	
			  },
			  error: function(data){
					alert("ERROR");
			  }
			});			
		}
	}
		
	function validateTextField(variables){
		var error = [];
		//validate textFields first
		for (i = 0; i < textFields.length; i++){
		    if(textFields[i] != 'needDate' && textFields[i] != 'explanation' && textFields[i] != 'projectId' && textFields[i] != 'requestDate' ){
				var value = variables[textFields[i]];
				if(textFields[i] == 'whereRun'){
					if(variables['whereRun'] == null){
						value = '';
					}
				}else{
					value = value.trim();
				}

				if(textFields[i] == 'otherPlace'){
					if(variables['whereRun'] == "other"){
						if(value.length == 0){
							error.push(textFields[i]);
						}
					}
				}else if(value.length == 0){
					if(textFields[i] != 'otherTaskValue'){
						error.push(textFields[i]);
					}
				}
		    }
		}
		
		return error;
	}
		
	function validateCheckbox(variables){
		var error=[];
		var selected = '';
		for(i = 0; i < checkboxs.length; i++){
			if(variables[checkboxs[i]] == 'true'){
				selected = 'true';
				break;
			}else{
				selected = 'false';
			}
		}
		if(selected == 'false'){
			error.push('err');
		}else{
			if(variables['otherTask'] == 'true'){
				if(variables['otherTaskValue'].trim().length == 0){
					error.push('otherTaskValue');
				}
			}
		}
		return error;
	}
		
	function moveToTop(){
		var container = $('#newProposal'), scrollTo = $('#anchor');
		container.scrollTop(scrollTo.offset().top - container.offset().top + container.scrollTop());
		container.animate({scrollTop: scrollTo.offset().top - container.offset().top + container.scrollTop()});
	}
	function moveToApprovalTop(){
		var container = $('#proposalDetail'), scrollTo = $('#anchor1');
		container.scrollTop(scrollTo.offset().top - container.offset().top + container.scrollTop());
		container.animate({scrollTop: scrollTo.offset().top - container.offset().top + container.scrollTop()});
	}	
	function showError(error){
		$('#errorMessage').html("<font color='red'> Please fill in data into highlight area.</font>");
		$('#errorMessage').show();
		for(i = 0; i < error.length; i++){
			$('#'+error[i]).css("background-color","yellow");
		}
	}
	
	function clearError(){
		$('#errorMessage').html("");
		$('#errorMessage').hide();
		for(i = 0; i < textFields.length; i++){
			$('#'+textFields[i]).css("background-color","");
		}
		$('#err').css("background-color","");
		$('#otherTaskValue').css("background-color","");
	}
	
	function saveRequest(){
		var variables = getProposalData();
		variables[0].user_id = "${jvar_my_sys_id}";
		variables[0].applicationName = applicationName;		
		var existId = $('#hideValue').val();
		if(existId != 'none'){
			variables[0].action = 'update';
		    variables[0].savedId = existId;
		}else{
			variables[0].action = 'add';
		}
		var param = JSON.stringify(variables);
		
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "POST",
		  contentType: "application/json",
		  url: "/api/naci/processdata/savedata",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: param,
		  success: function(data){
		       window.location.reload(true); 
		  },
		  error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
	      }
		});
		closeWin();
	}
		
	function getProposalData(){
		var variables= {};
		var index = 0;
		for(index=0; index < names.length; index++) {
			if(textFields.indexOf(names[index]) > -1){
				var value = $('#'+names[index]).val();
				if(names[index].indexOf('Date') > 0){
					value = getConvertedValue(value, '0');
				}
		        variables[names[index]] = value;
			}else{
	            if($('#'+names[index]).is(':checked')){
				   variables[names[index]] = 'true';
				}else{
		           variables[names[index]] = 'false';
                } 		
			}
		}
		return [variables];
	}
		
	function getConvertedValue(value, flag){
	   if(!value || 0 == value.length){
		   return "";
		}
	   if(flag == '0'){
		  var values = value.split('/');
		  return values[0]+'-'+values[1] + '-' + values[2];
		}else {
		  var values = value.split('-');
		  return values[0]+'/'+values[1] + '/' + values[2];
		}
	}	
	
	function clearForm(){
		for(index=0; index < names.length; index++) {
			if(textFields.indexOf(names[index]) != -1 ){ 
				$('#'+names[index]).val('');
		    }else{
			   $('#'+names[index]).prop('checked', false); 
			}
		}
		$('#otherTaskValue').prop('disabled', true);
		$('#otherPlace').hide();
	}

	function showSubmitButton(){
		if(isDCEGPI()){
			$('#submitterSpan').show();
		}else{
			$('#submitterSpan').hide();
		}
	}
	</script>
	<br/>
	
	<div class="container" style="width:80%;">
	  <div class="row">
		 <img src="NCI-logo-full.jpg" height="70" Alt="NCI LOGO"/> <span style="float:right"> <input type="button" class="btn btn-default active" value="Logout" onclick="javascript:logout();"/>     </span>
	  </div>
	  <div style="white-space:nowrap; display:inline;" class="col-md-12">
	    	<h3 class="tools-owner-title">DCEG Bioinformatics Resource Requisition System</h3>
      </div>
	  <div class="col-md-12">  </div>
      <div class="col-md-12">
    		Bioinformatics Resource Oversight Panel reviews and prioritize proposals from DCEG investigators for use of the resource of the Bioinformatics Group within the NCI's Center for Bioinformatics and Information Technology(CBIIT).
    		BROP periodically assesse the quality and timeliness of CBIIT Bioinformatics Group support and also review and prioritize projects that propose to use high-performance computing (HPC) infrastructure at the Cancer Genomics Research (CGR)
    		laboratory. Specifically, the CCAD cluster.
    		<br/>
    		Investigators should consist of summary of the project with a clear description of the scope of work, timeline and deliverables.
    		<br/>
    		A Bioinformatics Resource Oversight Panel Form should be in place PRIOR to starting the research    <span id="submitterSpan"> <input type="button" name="submitForm" id="submitForm" class="btn btn-default active" value="Submit a Proposal" onclick="newProposal();"/></span>
			<br/>
      </div>
	 <div class="row"><br/></div>
	<div class="row col-md-12" >
	  <div ng-app="saveRequestTable">
		
		<div ng-controller="saveTableControl"  id="saved_table" style="display:none;">
    		<div class="panel panel-success" >
    			<div class="panel-heading" role="tab" id="heading_savedItems">
    				<h4 class="panel-title">
    					<a role="button" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#collapsesavedItems" aria-expanded="true" aria-controls="collapsesavedItems">
    					<span class="accordion_icon"><i class="fa fa-minus-square"></i></span> Draft Proposals <span class="badge" id="ritm_count">{{count}}</span>
						</a>
    				</h4>
    			</div>
    			<div id="collapsesavedItems" class="panel-collapse collapse in" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="heading_savedItems">
    				<table  class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed">
						<tr>
							<th ng-click="sort('projectName')">Project Name <span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='projectName'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th ng-click="sort('name')">Principal Investigator <span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='name'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th ng-click="sort('createdOn')">Created Date <span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='createdOn'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th>Actions</th>
						</tr>
						<tr dir-paginate="data in myData|filter:search|orderBy:sortKey:reverse|itemsPerPage:pageSize" pagination-id="savedDataPagination"> 
    						<td class="ritm_number">{{data.projectName}}</td>
							<td class="ritm_cat_item">{{data.name}}</td>
    						<td class="ritm_cat_item">{{data.createdOn}}</td>
    						<td><button ng-click="listDetails(data.sysId);" class="btn btn-sm btn-default" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;"> Edit</button> 
    							<button ng-click="removeItem(data.sysId);" class="btn btn-sm btn-default" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">Delete</button>
    						</td>	
    					</tr>
    				</table>	
					<div>
						<table width="100%" border="0">
							<tr><td width="70%"><dir-pagination-controls pagination-id="savedDataPagination" direction-links="true" boundary-links="true"></dir-pagination-controls></td>
								<td width="25%" align="right"><label>Items per page  </label></td>
								<td width="5%" align="right">
									<select class="form-control" ng-model="pageSize" ng-init="pageSize='10'" style="width:80px;">
										<option value="5">5</option>
										<option value="10">10</option>
										<option value="15">15</option>
										<option value="20">20</option>
									</select>
								</td>
							</tr>
						</table>	
					</div>
				</div>
    		</div>		
    	</div>
		  
		<div ng-controller="secretaryViewControl" id="secretary_init_table" style="display:none;">
    		<div class="panel panel-success" >
    			<div class="panel-heading" role="tab" id="heading_secretaryViewItems">
    				<h4 class="panel-title">
    					<a role="button" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#collapseSecrettaryViewItems" aria-expanded="true" aria-controls="collapseSecrettaryViewItems">
    					<span class="accordion_icon"><i class="fa fa-minus-square"></i> </span> Proposals Waiting for Executive Secretary Initial Quality Control Check <span class="badge" id="ritm_count"> {{count}}</span>
    					</a>
    				</h4>
    			</div>
    			<div id="collapseSecrettaryViewItems" class="panel-collapse collapse in" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="heading_secretaryViewItems">
    				<table  class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed">
						<tr>
							<th ng-click="sort('number')">BROP ID <span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='number'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>

								<td width="25%" align="right"><label>Items per page  </label></td>
								<td width="5%" align="right">
									<select class="form-control" ng-model="pageSize" ng-init="pageSize='10'" style="width:80px;">
										<option value="5">5</option>
										<option value="10">10</option>
										<option value="15">15</option>
										<option value="20">20</option>
									</select>
								</td>
							</tr>
						</table>	
					</div>
				</div>
    		</div>		
    	</div>		

		<!-- Admin view -->
		<div ng-controller="adminViewControl" id="admin_view_table" style="display:none;">
    		<div class="panel panel-success" >
    			<div class="panel-heading" role="tab" id="heading_adminViewItems">
    				<h4 class="panel-title">
    					<a role="button" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#collapseAdminViewItems" aria-expanded="true" aria-controls="collapseAdminViewItems">
    					<span class="accordion_icon"><i class="fa fa-minus-square"></i> </span> All Bioinformatics Resource Oversight Panel Requests <span class="badge" id="ritm_count"> {{count}}</span>
    					</a>
    				</h4>
    			</div>
    			<div id="collapseAdminViewItems" class="panel-collapse collapse in" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="heading_adminViewItems">
    				<table  class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed">
						<tr>
							<th ng-click="sort('bropId')">BROP ID <span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='bropId'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th ng-click="sort('name')">Principal Investigator <span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='name'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th ng-click="sort('projectName')">Project Name <span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='projectName'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th ng-click="sort('submittedBy')">Submitted By <span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='submittedBy'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th ng-click="sort('submitDate')">Submitted Date <span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='submitDate'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th ng-click="sort('stage')">Status <span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='stage'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th ng-click="sort('estimate')">Estimated Hours <span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='estimate'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th ng-click="sort('actual')">Actual Hours <span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='actual'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th ng-click="sort('lastUpdateDate')">Last Update Date <span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='lastUpdateDate'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
                            <th>Actions</th>
                        </tr>
						<tr dir-paginate="data in myData|filter:search|orderBy:sortKey:reverse|itemsPerPage:pageSize" pagination-id="adminViewDataPagination"> 
							<td class="ritm_number">{{data.number}}</td>
						    <td class="ritm_cat_item">{{data.name}}</td>
						    <td class="ritm_cat_item">{{data.projectName}}</td>
    						<td class="ritm_cat_item">{{data.submittedBy}}</td>
    						<td class="ritm_cat_item">{{data.submitDate}}</td>
    						<td class="ritm_cat_item">{{data.stage}}</td>
    						<td class="ritm_cat_item">{{data.estimate}}</td>
							<td class="ritm_cat_item">{{data.actual}}</td>
							<td class="ritm_cat_item">{{data.lastUpdateDate}}</td>
                            <td>
								<button ng-click="displayDetails(data.sysId);" class="btn btn-sm btn-default" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;"> View</button> 
							</td>	
    					</tr>
    				</table>	
					<div>
						<table width="100%" border="0">
							<tr><td width="70%"><dir-pagination-controls pagination-id="adminViewDataPagination" direction-links="true" boundary-links="true"></dir-pagination-controls></td>
								<td width="25%" align="right"><label>Items per page  </label></td>
								<td width="5%" align="right">
									<select class="form-control" ng-model="pageSize" ng-init="pageSize='10'" style="width:80px;">
										<option value="5">5</option>
										<option value="10">10</option>
										<option value="15">15</option>
										<option value="20">20</option>
									</select>
								</td>
							</tr>
						</table>	
					</div>
				</div>
    		</div>		
    	</div>	

	</div>
	</div>

		  <br/><br/><br/><br/>
	 </div>

	<div id="newProposal" class="modal fade" data-keyboard="false" data-backdrop="static">
		  <div class="modal-dialog modal-lg" style="width:1000px;">
				<div class="modal-content" style="overflow-y:auto; overflow-x: hidden;">
					  <div class="modal-header">
						  <button type="button" class="close btn btn-xs" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close"><span aria-hidden="true">x</span></button>
						   <div id="anchor">
							 <font size="5"> <b>Bioinformatics Resource Oversight Panel (BROP) Proposal</b></font>
						   </div>
					  </div>
					  <div class="modal-body" width="70%">
						 <div class="container">
							 <div class="row">
								 <div class="col-md-10">
									 Once proposals have been received they will be evaluated and prioritized on the following criteria: Scientific importance, Feasibility of Timeline/workload. Status of Projects in queue. Is the request Collaborative or Methodologic. Is the request for generating new data or data that has been waiting to be processed.
								 </div>
							 </div>
							 <div class="col-md-12">  </div>
							 <div class="row">
								 <div class="col-md-10">
									 <div class="panel panel-default">
										<div class="panel-heading"><h2 class="panel-title">Proposal Information</h2></div>
										<div class="panel-body">
											<div class="row col-md-12" id="errorMessage" style="display:none;"></div>
											<div class="row">
												<label class="col-sm-8"><font color='red'>*</font>Name</label>
												<label class="col-sm-4"><font color='red'>*</font>CAS Study Code</label>
											</div>
											<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
												 <div class="col-sm-8"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="name"/></div>
												<div class="col-sm-4"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="casCode"/></div>
											</div>											
											<div class="row">
												<label class="col-sm-8"><font color='red'>*</font>Project Name</label>
												<label class="col-sm-4"><font color='red'>*</font>BRG Approval Number (if applicable)</label>
											</div>
											<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
												<div class="col-sm-8"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="projectName" /></div>
												<div class="col-sm-4"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="trcNumber"/></div>
											</div>
											<div class="row">
												<label class="col-sm-4">Need by Date</label>
												<label class="col-sm-8">Explanation</label>
											</div>
											<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
												<div class="col-sm-4"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="needDate"/></div>
												<div class="col-sm-8">
												<textarea id="explanation" class="form-control" rows="3" style="width:100%;" name="explanation" form="usrform" placeholder="Explain why need by this date"></textarea>
												</div>
											</div>
										</div>	
									 </div>	 
									<div class="panel panel-default">
										<div class="panel-heading"><h2 class="panel-title"><font color='red'>*</font>Description of Request</h2></div>
										<div class="panel-body">
											<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
												<div class="col-sm-12">
													<textarea id="requestDescription" rows="4" style="width:100%;margin-top:10px" name="comment" form="usrform" placeholder="Describe the project in a few brief paragrpahs including the background, description and hypothesis"></textarea>
												</div>
											</div>	
											<div class="panel panel-default">
												<div class="panel-heading"><h2 class="panel-title">Description of the scope of work being requested</h2></div>
												<div class="panel-body">
													<div class="row">
														<label class="col-sm-6"><font color='red'>*</font>Data Processing: Technology / Specific programs needed</label>
														<label class="col-sm-3"><font color='red'>*</font>Where will analysis be run</label>
														<label class="col-sm-3">  </label>
													</div>
													<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
														<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="technologyNeed" /></div>
														<div class="col-sm-3">
															<select id="whereRun" class="form-control" style="width:200;" onchange="valueChange();">
																<option value="biowulf">Biowulf</option>
																<option value="ccad">CCAD Cluster</option>
																<option value="cgems">CGEMS Cluster</option>
																<option value="unknown">Unknown</option>
																<option value="other">Other</option>
															</select>
														</div>
														<div class="col-sm-3"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="otherPlace" style="width:200; display:none;"/></div>
													</div>
												</div>
											</div>											
											<div class="panel panel-default">
												<div class="panel-heading"><h2 class="panel-title">Data Attributes</h2></div>
												<div class="panel-body">
													<div class="row">
														<label class="col-sm-4"><font color='red'>*</font>Where is the data currently stored</label>
														<label class="col-sm-4"><font color='red'>*</font>What is the physical size</label>
														<label class="col-sm-4"><font color='red'>*</font>Current format of data files(s)</label>
													</div>
													<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
														<div class="col-sm-4"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="whereStore" /></div>
														<div class="col-sm-4"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="size"  /></div>
														<div class="col-sm-4"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="fileFormat" /></div>
													</div>
													<div class="row">
														<label class="col-sm-12"><font color='red'>*</font>Concrete list of Deliverables (including any deadlines)</label>
													</div>
													<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
														<div class="col-sm-12"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="listDeliverables" /></div>
													</div>
														<div class="row">
														<label class="col-sm-12"><font color='red'>*</font>List Primary Collaborators</label>
													</div>
													<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
														<div class="col-sm-12"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="listCollaborators" /></div>
													</div>
												</div>
											</div>
										</div>											
									 </div> 	
									<div class="panel panel-default">
										<div class="panel-heading" id="err"><h2 class="panel-title"><font color='red'>*</font>Requested Bioinformatics Tasks</h2></div>
											<div class="panel-body">
												<div class="row">
													<label class="col-sm-6"><b>Description</b></label>
													<label class="col-sm-3"><b>Timeframe (in Hour)</b></label>
													<label class="col-sm-3"><b>Timeframe(in work-days)</b></label>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="imputation"/> Imputation</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">96 ~ 120</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">4.0 ~ 5.0</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="hpvAnalysis"/> HPV Analysis</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">24 ~ 48</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">1.0 ~ 2.0</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="matrix"/> Matrix eQTL</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">12 ~ 36</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">0.5 ~ 1.5</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="gwas"/> GWAS Analysis on TCGA</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">12 ~ 48</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">0.5 ~ 2.0</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="predixan"/> Predixan / MetaXcan</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">24 ~ 36</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">1.0 ~ 1.5</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="ase"/> ASE (allele-specific expression) Analysis</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">48 ~ 72</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">2.0 ~ 3.0</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="rnaseq"/> Total Gene Expression Calling on RNASeq</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">24 ~ 48</div>
												<div class="col-sm-3">1.0 ~ 2.0</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="gwasEnrich"/> GWAS Enrichment Analysis</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">24 ~ 48</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">1.0 ~ 2.0</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="idsc"/> Idsc Heritability and Genetic Correlation Analysis</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">8 ~ 12</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">0.3 ~ 0.5</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="vcf"/> Rare Variants Analysis, vcf Annotation QC, Burden Test</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">24 ~ 48</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">1.0 ~ 2.0</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="pencnv"/> PenCNV Copy Number Analysis</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">16 ~ 24</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">0.7 ~ 1.0</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="gcta"/> GCTA Analysis</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">16 ~ 24</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">0.7 ~ 1.0</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="otherTask" onclick="otherTaskChange();"/> Other   <input type="text" id="otherTaskValue" style="width:300px;" disabled="disabled"/> </div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">
														 
													</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">
														 
													</div>
												</div>
											</div>
										</div>
								 </div>	
							 </div>
							<div class="col-sm-12">
								<input type="button" id="submit" style="margin-top:5px;margin-left:25%; width: 100px; text-align:center;" value="Submit" class="btn btn-default active" onclick="loadSubmitRequest();"/>  
								<input type="button" id="resubmit" style="margin-top:5px;margin-left:25%; width: 100px; text-align:center;" value="Resubmit" class="btn btn-default active"  onclick="loadResubmitConfirm();"/>  
								<input type="button" id="save" style="margin-top:5px;width: 100px; text-align:center;" value="Save" class="btn btn-default active"  onclick="saveRequest();"/>  
								<input type="button" id="cancel" style="margin-top:5px;width: 100px; text-align:center;" value="Cancel" class="btn btn-default active" onclick="javascript:closeWin();"/>
								<input type="hidden" id="hideValue"/>
								<input type="hidden" id="hideComments"/>
								<input type="hidden" id="hideRequestId" />
								<input type="hidden" id="hideTicketNum" value="0"/>
							</div>							 
						 </div>
					  </div>
				</div>	
		  </div>	  
	</div>

	<div id="proposalDetail" class="modal fade" data-keyboard="false" data-backdrop="static">
		  <div class="modal-dialog modal-lg" style="width:1000px;">
				<div class="modal-content" style="overflow-y:auto; overflow-x: hidden;">
					  <div class="modal-header">
						  <button type="button" class="close btn btn-xs" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close"><span aria-hidden="true">x</span></button>
						   <div id="anchor1">
							 <font size="5"> <b>Bioinformatics Resource Oversight Panel (BROP) Proposal</b></font>
						   </div>
					  </div>
					  <div class="modal-body" width="70%">
						 <div class="container">

								 <div class="col-md-10">

Is the request Collaborative or Methodologic. Is the request for generating new data or data that has been waiting to be processed.
								 </div>
							 </div>
							 <div class="col-md-12">  </div>
							 <div class="col-md-12" id="errMsg" style="display:none;"></div>							 
							 <div class="row">
								 <div class="col-md-10">
									 <div class="panel panel-default">
										<div class="panel-heading"><h2 class="panel-title">Proposal Information</h2></div>
										<div class="panel-body">
											<div class="row col-md-12" id="errorMessage" style="display:none;"></div>
											<div class="row">
												<label class="col-sm-8">Name</label>
												<label class="col-sm-4">Request Date</label>
											</div>
											<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
												<div class="col-sm-8"><span id="name1"></span></div>
												<div class="col-sm-4"><span id="requestDate1"></span></div>

											<div class="row">
												<label class="col-sm-8">Project Name</label>
												<label class="col-sm-4">CAS Study Code</label>
											</div>
											<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
												<div class="col-sm-8"><span id="projectName1"></span></div>
												<div class="col-sm-4"><span id="casCode1"></span></div>
											</div>
											<div class="row">
												<label class="col-sm-8">Project ID (BROP0XY-ZZZ-PI)</label>
												<label class="col-sm-4">TRC Approval Number (if applicable)</label>
											</div>
											<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
												<div class="col-sm-8"><span id="projectId1" ></span></div>
												<div class="col-sm-4"><span id="trcNumber1"></span></div>
											</div>
											<div class="row">
												<label class="col-sm-4"> Need by Date</label>

											</div>
											<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
												<div class="col-sm-4"><span id="needDate1"></span></div>
												<div class="col-sm-8"><span id="explanation1"></span></div>
											</div>
										</div>	
									 </div>	 
									<div class="panel panel-default">
										<div class="panel-heading"><h2 class="panel-title">Description of Request</h2></div>
										<div class="panel-body">
											<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
												<div class="col-sm-12">
													<span id="requestDescription1"></span>
												</div>
											</div>	
											<div class="panel panel-default">
												<div class="panel-heading"><h2 class="panel-title">Description of the scope of work being requested</h2></div>
												<div class="panel-body">
													<div class="row">
														<label class="col-sm-6">Data Processing: Technology / Specific programs needed</label>
														<label class="col-sm-3">Where will the analysis be run</label>
														<label class="col-sm-3">  </label>
													</div>
													<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
														<div class="col-sm-6"><span id="technologyNeed1"></span></div>
														<div class="col-sm-3">
															<span id="whereRun1"></span>
														</div>
														<div class="col-sm-3"><span id="otherPlace1"></span></div>
													</div>
												</div>
											</div>											
											<div class="panel panel-default">
												<div class="panel-heading"><h2 class="panel-title">Data Attributes</h2></div>
												<div class="panel-body">
													<div class="row">
														<label class="col-sm-6">Where is the data currently stored</label>
														<label class="col-sm-3">What is the physical size</label>
														<label class="col-sm-3">Current format of the data files(s)</label>
													</div>
													<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
														<div class="col-sm-6"><span id="whereStore1"></span></div>
														<div class="col-sm-3"><span id="size1"></span></div>
														<div class="col-sm-3"><span id="fileFormat1"></span></div>
													</div>

														<label class="col-sm-12">Concrete list of Deliverables (including any deadlines)</label>
													</div>
													<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
														<div class="col-sm-12"><span id="listDeliverables1"></span></div>
													</div>

														<label class="col-sm-12">List Primary Collaborators</label>
													</div>
													<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
														<div class="col-sm-12"><span id="listCollaborators1"></span></div>
													</div>
												</div>
											</div>
										</div>											
									 </div> 	
									<div class="panel panel-default">
										<div class="panel-heading" id="err"><h2 class="panel-title">Requested Bioinformatics Tasks</h2></div>
											<div class="panel-body">
												<div class="row">
													<label class="col-sm-6"><b>Description</b></label>
													<label class="col-sm-3"><b>Timeframe (in Hour)</b></label>
													<label class="col-sm-3"><b>Timeframe(in work-days)</b></label>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="imputation1" disabled="disabled"/> Imputation</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">96 ~ 120</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">4.0 ~ 5.0</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="hpvAnalysis1" disabled="disabled"/> HPV Analysis</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">24 ~ 48</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">1.0 ~ 2.0</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="matrix1" disabled="disabled"/> Matrix eQTL</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">12 ~ 36</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">0.5 ~ 1.5</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="gwas1" disabled="disabled"/> GWAS Analysis on TCGA</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">12 ~ 48</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">0.5 ~ 2.0</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="predixan1" disabled="disabled"/> Predixan / MetaXcan</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">24 ~ 36</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">1.0 ~ 1.5</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="ase1" disabled="disabled"/> ASE (allele-specific expression) Analysis</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">48 ~ 72</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">2.0 ~ 3.0</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="rnaseq1" disabled="disabled"/> Total Gene Expression Calling on RNASeq</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">24 ~ 48</div>
												<div class="col-sm-3">1.0 ~ 2.0</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="gwasEnrich1" disabled="disabled"/> GWAS Enrichment Analysis</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">24 ~ 48</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">1.0 ~ 2.0</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="idsc1" disabled="disabled"/> Idsc Heritability and Genetic Correlation Analysis</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">8 ~ 12</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">0.3 ~ 0.5</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="vcf1" disabled="disabled"/> Rare Variants Analysis, vcf Annotation QC, Burden Test</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">24 ~ 48</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">1.0 ~ 2.0</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="pencnv1" disabled="disabled"/> PenCNV Copy Number Analysis</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">16 ~ 24</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">0.7 ~ 1.0</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="gcta1" disabled="disabled"/> GCTA Analysis</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">16 ~ 24</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">0.7 ~ 1.0</div>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
													<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="checkbox" id="otherTask1" disabled="disabled"/> Other   <span id="otherTaskValue1" disabled="disabled"></span> </div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">
														 
													</div>
													<div class="col-sm-3">
														 
													</div>
												</div>
											</div>
									 </div>
									 <div id="commets" style="display:none;">
						                    <div class="panel panel-default">
												<div class="panel-heading" id="err"><h2 class="panel-title">Approval Status</h2></div>
												<div class="panel-body">
													<div id="commentReviewId1"></div>
												 </div>
										   </div> 
									 </div>
									 <div align="center" id="bioSelectorId" style="display:none;">
										<div id="optionDiv"></div> <br/>
									 </div>	 
									 <div id="commentTextarea" style="display:none;">
											<div class="panel panel-default">
												<div class="panel-heading" id="err"><h2 class="panel-title">Commets</h2></div>
													<div class="panel-body">

									 </div>

									 </div>
									 
									<div class="col-sm-12" id="okDiv" style="display:none;">

									</div>

										<input type="button" id="fastTrack" style="margin-top:5px;margin-left:10%" value="Recommend to Fast Track Approve" class="btn btn-default active" onclick="loadSecretaryFastTrackConfirm()"/>  
										<input type="button" id="approve" style="margin-top:5px" value="Recommend to Approve" class="btn btn-default active" onclick="loadSecretaryApprovalConfirm()"/>  
										<input type="button" id="reject" style="margin-top:5px" value="Recommend to Revise" class="btn btn-default active" onclick="loadSecretaryRejectConfirm()"/>  
										<input type="button" id="cancel" style="margin-top:5px" value="Cancel" class="btn btn-default active" onclick="$('#proposalDetail').modal('hide');"/>									 
									 </div>

										<input type="button" id="reject1" style="margin-top:5px" value="Recommend to Revise" class="btn btn-default active" onclick="loadCommitteeRejectConfirm()"/>

										<input type="button" id="reject3" style="margin-top:5px" value="Recommend to Revise" class="btn btn-default active" onclick="loadSecretaryRejectConfirm()"/>  
										<input type="button" id="cancel3" style="margin-top:5px" value="Cancel" class="btn btn-default active" onclick="$('#proposalDetail').modal('hide');"/>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService</name><script><![CDATA[function bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService($http) {

    this.getData = function (sessionId, searchParams) {

        return new Promise(function (resolve, reject) {
            var request = {
                url: '/api/naci/getdata/getRequestDataThroughApproverTable',
                method: 'GET',
                beforeSend: function (xhr) { xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); },
                headers: {
                    'Content-Type': 'application/json'
                },
                params: searchParams
            };
            $http(request).then(
				function (response) {
					resolve (response.data.result);				
			}, function (error) {
				reject(error);
			});			
        });
	};
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-31 22:30:32</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>d9edd77cdb8c534054d8ff621f96193d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_d9edd77cdb8c534054d8ff621f96193d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-01 15:07:55</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

'); }else{ $('#' + checkboxs[k]).html(''); } options[checkboxs[k]] = value; } var number = obj['number']; var currentTime = new Date() var year = currentTime.getFullYear(); var bropId = "BROP-"+ year + "-" +number.substring(8); $('#bropId').html(bropId); var comments = obj['comments']; var myComments = ""; if(comments != null && comments.length > 5){ $('#commets').show(); myComments = parse(comments, "false"); $('#commentReviewId1').html(myComments); myComments = parse(comments, "true"); $('#commentReviewId2').html(myComments); $('#printApprovalStatus').val('yes'); }else{ $('#printApprovalStatus').val('no'); } }, error: function(data){ alert("ERROR"); }, async: false }); return options; } function parse(allcomments, forPDF) { var comments = allcomments.split("ENDCOMMENTS"); var commentsblock = ''; if(forPDF == "false"){ commentsblock = commentsblock.replace("data6", ""); commentsblock = commentsblock + ''; }else if(forPDF == "true"){ commentsblock = commentsblock + ''; } for(i = 0; i < comments .length; i++){ if (comments[i].length > 40) { if (comments[i][0] == '\n') { var lastI = 0; while (lastI < comments[i].length && comments[i][lastI] == '\n') lastI ++; comments[i] = comments[i].substring(lastI,comments[i].length); } var t = comments[i].substring(0,22); var approver = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(ENDROLE)')+9,comments[i].length); var results = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 57,comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 65); var comm= comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 66, comments[i].indexOf('(role)')); var role = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(role)') + 6, comments[i].indexOf('(ENDROLE)')); commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; if(results == 'approved'){ results = "Recommend to Approved"; }else if(results == 'rejected'){ results = "Recommend to Revise"; }else{ results = "Unknown Action"; } commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; } } commentsblock = commentsblock + "
RoleApproverApproval StatusCommentsTime
Approval Status    
RoleApproverApproval StatusCommentsTime
" + role + "" + approver + "" + results+ "" + comm + "" + t + "
"; return commentsblock; } function addTableToPdf(doc, data, height){ var res = doc.autoTableHtmlToJson(data); doc.autoTable(res.columns, res.data, {startX:300, startY: height, headerStyles:{fillColor: [204, 204, 204], textColor: [0, 0, 25]}, styles:{overflow: 'linebreak', columnWidth: 'wrap'}, columnStyles: { 0: {columnWidth: 250}, 1: {columnWidth: 250}}}); } function addTableToPdf5(doc, data, height){ var res = doc.autoTableHtmlToJson(data); doc.autoTable(res.columns, res.data, {startX:300, startY: height, headerStyles:{fillColor: [204, 204, 204], textColor: [0, 0, 25]}, styles:{overflow: 'linebreak', columnWidth: 'wrap'}, columnStyles: { 0: {columnWidth: 300}, 1: {columnWidth: 200}}}); } function addTableToPdf2(doc, data, height){ var res = doc.autoTableHtmlToJson(data); doc.autoTable(res.columns, res.data, {startX:300, startY: height, headerStyles:{fillColor: [204, 204, 204], textColor: [0, 0, 25]}, styles:{overflow: 'linebreak', columnWidth: 'wrap'}, columnStyles: { 0: {columnWidth: 500}}}); doc,cursor,settings,pageCount,table;var themes={striped:{table:{fillColor:255,textColor:80,fontStyle:"normal",fillStyle:"F"},header:{textColor:255,fillColor:[41,128,185],rowHeight:23,fontStyle:"bold"},body:{},alternateRow:{fillColor:245}},grid:{table:{fillColor:255,textColor:80,fontStyle:"normal",lineWidth:.1,fillStyle:"DF"},header:{textColor:255,fillColor:[26,188,156],rowHeight:23,fillStyle:"F",fontStyle:"bold"},body:{},alternateRow:{}},plain:{header:{fontStyle:"bold"}}};var defaultOptions=function defaultOptions(){return{theme:"striped",styles:{},headerStyles:{},bodyStyles:{},alternateRowStyles:{},columnStyles:{},startY:false,margin:40,pageBreak:"auto",tableWidth:"auto",createdHeaderCell:function createdHeaderCell(cell,data){},createdCell:function createdCell(cell,data){},drawHeaderRow:function drawHeaderRow(row,data){},drawRow:function drawRow(row,data){},drawHeaderCell:function drawHeaderCell(cell,data){},drawCell:function drawCell(cell,data){},beforePageContent:function beforePageContent(data){},afterPageContent:function afterPageContent(data){}}};API.autoTable=function(headers,data,options){validateInput(headers,data,options);doc=this;settings=initOptions(options||{});pageCount=1;cursor={y:settings.startY===false?settings.margin.top:settings.startY};var userStyles={textColor:30,fontSize:doc.internal.getFontSize(),fontStyle:doc.internal.getFont().fontStyle};createModels(headers,data);calculateWidths();var firstRowHeight=table.rows[0]&&settings.pageBreak==="auto"?table.rows[0].height:0;var minTableBottomPos=settings.startY+settings.margin.bottom+table.headerRow.height+firstRowHeight;if(settings.pageBreak==="avoid"){minTableBottomPos+=table.height}if(settings.pageBreak==="always"&&settings.startY!==false||settings.startY!==false&&minTableBottomPos>doc.internal.pageSize.height){doc.addPage();cursor.y=settings.margin.top}applyStyles(userStyles);settings.beforePageContent(hooksData());if(settings.drawHeaderRow(table.headerRow,hooksData({row:table.headerRow}))!==false){printRow(table.headerRow,settings.drawHeaderCell)}applyStyles(userStyles);printRows();settings.afterPageContent(hooksData());applyStyles(userStyles);return this};API.autoTableEndPosY=function(){if(typeof cursor==="undefined"||typeof cursor.y==="undefined"){return 0}return cursor.y};API.autoTableHtmlToJson=function(tableElem,includeHiddenRows){includeHiddenRows=includeHiddenRows||false;var header=tableElem.rows[0];var result={columns:[],rows:[]};for(var k=0;k<header.cells.length;k++){var cell=header.cells[k];result.columns.push(typeof cell!=="undefined"?cell.textContent:"")}for(var i=1;i<tableElem.rows.length;i++){var tableRow=tableElem.rows[i];var style=window.getComputedStyle(tableRow);if(includeHiddenRows||style.display!=="none"){var rowData=[];for(var j=0;j<header.cells.length;j++){rowData.push(typeof tableRow.cells[j]!=="undefined"?tableRow.cells[j].textContent:"")}result.rows.push(rowData)}}result.data=result.rows;return result};API.autoTableText=function(text,x,y,styles){if(typeof x!=="number"||typeof y!=="number"){console.error("The x and y parameters are required. Missing for the text: ",text)}var fontSize=doc.internal.getFontSize()/doc.internal.scaleFactor;var lineHeightProportion=FONT_ROW_RATIO;var splitRegex=/
