sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_a1f5fddddb981f40f59974131f961987
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope, spUtil, bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService, bropRequestDetailsService, bropActionControlService, bropConstantsService) {
	/* widget controller */
	var c = this;

	/* data from server */
	var sessionId = c.data.info.sessionId;
	var userId = c.data.info.userId;
	$scope.canView = c.data.info.canView;
	
	/* local variables */
    var method = "committeeReviewed";
	
	/* scope variables and functions */
	$scope.panelInfo = { 
		tableId: 'committee_reviewed_table',
		panelHeadingId: 'heading_committeeReviewedItems', 
		collapseTarget: 'collapseCommitteeReviewedItems', 
		panelTitle: 'Proposals Reviewed by Full Committee' 
	};
	
 	$scope.paginationId = "committeeReviewedDataPagination";
	
	$scope.tableColumns = [
		{'name': 'number', 'text': 'BROP ID',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_number'},
		{'name': 'name', 'text': 'Principal Investigator',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'projectName', 'text': 'Project Name',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedBy', 'text': 'Submitted By',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedDate', 'text': 'Submitted Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'stage', 'text': 'Status',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'status', 'text': 'Previous Status',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'actions', 'text': 'Actions',  'sortable': false}
	];
	
	$scope.actions = [ 
		{ 'type': 'button', 'action': 'displayDetails(data.requestId, data.approvalId);', 'text': 'View' },			   
		{ 'type': 'link', 'action': '$sp.do?id=dceg_report_page&sys_id={{data.requestId}}', 'text': 'Export' }	
	];
	
	 $scope.sort=function(keyname){	
			$scope.sortKey = keyname;
			$scope.reverse = !$scope.reverse;
	 };
	
	$scope.displayDetails = function(id, approvalId){
		
		bropActionControlService.showActionButton('pi'); 
		bropRequestDetailsService.getData(sessionId, id, approvalId).then(handleResponse, handleError);
		
	};	
	
	/* local functions */
    function handleRequestDataResponse(results) {
        $scope.myData = results;
        $scope.count = results.length;
        if ($scope.count == 0) {
			$scope.hasData = false;
            $('#committee_reviewed_table').hide();
        } else {
			$scope.hasData = true;
            $('#committee_reviewed_table').show();
        }
		$scope.$apply();
    }
	
	function getSearchParameters() {
		return {type: method, userId: userId, catDesc: bropConstantsService.getCatItemDesc() };
	}
	
	function handleResponse() {
		$scope.$apply(); 
	}
		
	function handleError(error) {
        alert('ERROR: ' + JSON.stringify(error));
	}
	
	function getData() {
		var searchParams = getSearchParameters();
		bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService.getData(sessionId, searchParams)
		.then(handleRequestDataResponse, handleError);
	}
	
	/* initialization */
	$('#committee_reviewed_table').hide();
    $scope.myData = [];
	if ($scope.canView) {
		getData();
	 }
	
	spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "sysapproval_approver", "", function() {  
		getData();
	});	
	
	
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css/><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>drbc</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>DCEG Reviewed By Committee</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var session_id = gs.getSessionToken();
	var userId = gs.getUserID();
	var user = gs.getUser();
	var canView = user.isMemberOf('DCEG_COMMITTEE');

	data.info = {
		userId: userId,
		sessionId: session_id,
		canView: canView
	};	

})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-14 14:28:28</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>a1f5fddddb981f40f59974131f961987</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DCEG Reviewed By Committee</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_a1f5fddddb981f40f59974131f961987</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-03-06 17:00:17</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<brop-panel ng-if="canView && hasData"></brop-panel>        ]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_d29be278db4d3e0054d8ff621f961943
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getRequestDataThroughApproverTable</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var jsonArr = [];	
	var cat_item_desc = request.queryParams.catDesc;
	var gr_cat_items = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
    gr_cat_items.addQuery('short_description', cat_item_desc);
    gr_cat_items.query();
	gr_cat_items.next();
 	var cat_item_id = gr_cat_items.getValue('sys_id');
	

	var user_id = request.queryParams.userId;
	var type = request.queryParams.type.toString();
	var typeWord = "";
	
	if(type == "init"){
		typeWord = 'Waiting for Executive Secretary Review';
	}else if(type == 'committee'){
		typeWord = 'Waiting for Full Committee to review';
	}else if(type == 'chair'){
		typeWord = 'Waiting for Chair to review';
	}else if(type == 'secretaryFinal'){
		//typeWord = 'Waiting Executive Secretary final review';
		typeWord = 'Waiting for Full Committee to review';
	}else if(type == 'bioinformatician'){
		typeWord = 'In Bioinformatician\'s queue';
	}else if(type =="secreatryTransfer"){
		typeWord = 'Waiting for Secretary transfer review';
	}else if(type == 'bioinformationProgress'){
		typeWord = 'Analysis in Progress';
	}else if (type == 'bioinformationCompleted'){
		typeWord = 'Analysis Completed';
	}else if(type == 'secretaryReviewed'){
		typeWord = 'secretaryReviewed';
	}else if(type == 'committeeReviewed'){
		typeWord = 'committeeReviewed';
	}else if(type == 'chairmanReviewed'){
		typeWord = 'chairmanReviewed';
	}
	
	 var gr_approval_items = GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
     var req_item = gr_approval_items.addJoinQuery('sc_req_item','document_id','sys_id');
     req_item.addCondition('cat_item',cat_item_id);
  
	 gr_approval_items.addQuery('approver', user_id);
	
	 if(type == 'committee'){
		  gr_approval_items.addQuery('wf_activity.stage.name', typeWord);
		  gr_approval_items.addQuery('state', 'NOT IN', 'approved, rejected');
	 }else if(typeWord == 'secretaryReviewed'){
		  var qc = gr_approval_items.addQuery('wf_activity.stage.name', 'Waiting for Executive Secretary Review');
          qc.addOrCondition('wf_activity.stage.name','Waiting for Secretary transfer review');
  	      qc.addOrCondition('wf_activity.stage.name','Waiting for Full Committee to review');
		  var qc1 = gr_approval_items.addQuery('state', 'approved');
		  qc1.addOrCondition('state','rejected');
	 }else if(typeWord == 'committeeReviewed'){
		  gr_approval_items.addQuery('wf_activity.stage.name', 'Waiting for Full Committee to review');
		  var qc2 = gr_approval_items.addQuery('state', 'approved');
		  qc2.addOrCondition('state','rejected');		 
	 }else if(typeWord == 'chairmanReviewed'){
		  gr_approval_items.addQuery('wf_activity.stage.name', 'Waiting for Chair to review');
		  var qc3 = gr_approval_items.addQuery('state', 'approved');
		  qc3.addOrCondition('state','rejected');		 
	 }else{
		 gr_approval_items.addQuery('wf_activity.stage.name', typeWord);
	 }	 
	 gr_approval_items.addQuery('source_table','sc_req_item'); 
     gr_approval_items.orderByDesc('sys_updated_on');  
     gr_approval_items.query();
	
	var projectName = "";
	var name = "";	
	
    while (gr_approval_items.next()){

        var status = gr_approval_items.wf_activity.stage.name;			
        var stage = gr_approval_items.document_id.context.stage.name;
		if(stage.toString() == typeWord || typeWord == 'secretaryReviewed' || typeWord == 'committeeReviewed' || typeWord == 'chairmanReviewed' ){
			var variables =  gr_approval_items.document_id.variables;
			var number = 'BROP-' + gr_approval_items.document_id.sys_created_on.substring(0,4) + '-'+ gr_approval_items.document_id.number.substring(8);
			var submittedDate = gr_approval_items.document_id.sys_created_on;
			var submittedBy =  gr_approval_items.document_id.opened_by.getDisplayValue();
			var lastUpdateDate = gr_approval_items.document_id.sys_updated_on;
			var requestId = gr_approval_items.document_id.sys_id;
			var approvalId = gr_approval_items.sys_id;
			var isFastTrack = gr_approval_items.document_id.u_director;
			var estiHour = "";
			if(typeWord == 'Analysis in Progress'){
				var estimateHour = gr_approval_items.document_id.u_computer_decal;
				var hours = estimateHour.split(",");
				estiHour = hours[0].substring('estimate:'.length);
			}
			for(var key in variables){
				if(variables[key].getGlideObject().getQuestion().getName() == 'projectName'){
					projectName = variables[key].getDisplayValue();
				}
				if(variables[key].getGlideObject().getQuestion().getName() == 'name'){
					name = variables[key].getDisplayValue();
				}
			}		
			
			var orgin_id = gr_approval_items.document_id.contact_type;
			if(orgin_id != null && orgin_id.toString().length > 0 && orgin_id.toString() != "Web"){
				    var idVer = orgin_id.toString().split(",");
				    var id = idVer[0];
				    var version = idVer[1];
				    var gr_tracking = new GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
						gr_tracking.addQuery('u_orgid',id.toString());
						gr_tracking.query();
				        gr_tracking.next();
				        var ticketNum = gr_tracking.u_ticket_number;
				        number = ticketNum + "-" + version;
			}
			if(type == 'secretaryFinal' || type == 'committeeReviewed'){
				stage = 'Waiting Executive Secretary final review';
			}
            submittedDate = submittedDate.toString().split(" ")[0];
			lastUpdateDate = lastUpdateDate.toString().split(" ")[0]; 
			jsonArr.push({
				number: number.toString(),
				projectName: projectName,
				name: name,
				stage: stage.toString(),
				submitDate: submittedDate.toString(),
				submittedBy: submittedBy.toString(),
				lastUpdateDate: lastUpdateDate.toString(),
				requestId: requestId.toString(),
				approvalId: approvalId.toString(),
				isFastTrack: isFastTrack.toString(),
				estimateHour: estiHour,
				status: status.toString(),
			});
		}	
	}	
	
	
	return jsonArr;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/getdata/getRequestDataThroughApproverTable</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getRequestDataThroughApproverTable</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-02-17 19:32:52</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>d29be278db4d3e0054d8ff621f961943</sys_id><sys_mod_count>76</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getRequestDataThroughApproverTable</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_d29be278db4d3e0054d8ff621f961943</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-14 18:27:09</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GetData">65a592d9dbfc3a00f59974131f961989</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_4e845bd1dbdc1f40f59974131f961996
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope, spUtil, bropAnalysisCompletedService, bropRequestDetailsService, bropActionControlService, bropConstantsService) {
	/* widget controller */
	var c = this;

	/* data from server */
	var sessionId = c.data.info.sessionId;
	var userId = c.data.info.userId;
	$scope.canView = c.data.info.canView;
	
	/* local variables */
	
	/* scope variables and functions */
	$scope.panelInfo = { 
		tableId: 'bioinformatician_complete_view_table',
		panelHeadingId: 'heading_bioinformaticianCompleteViewItems', 
		collapseTarget: 'collapseBioinformaticainCompleteViewItems', 
		panelTitle: 'Analysis Completed' 
	};
	
 	$scope.paginationId = "bioinformaticianCompleteViewDataPagination";
	
	$scope.tableColumns = [
		{'name': 'number', 'text': 'BROP ID',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_number'},
		{'name': 'name', 'text': 'Principal Investigator',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'projectName', 'text': 'Project Name',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'stage', 'text': 'Status',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedDate', 'text': 'Submitted Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'estimateHour', 'text': 'Estimated Hours',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'actualHour', 'text': 'Actual Hours',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'actions', 'text': 'Actions',  'sortable': false}
	];
	
	$scope.actions = [ 
		{ 'type': 'button', 'action': 'finish(data.sysId);', 'text': 'View' },	
		{ 'type': 'link', 'action': '$sp.do?id=dceg_report_page&sys_id={{data.requestId}}', 'text': 'Export' }	
	];
	
	 $scope.sort=function(keyname){	
			$scope.sortKey = keyname;
			$scope.reverse = !$scope.reverse;
	 };
	
	$scope.finish = function(requestId, approvalId) {
		bropActionControlService.showActionButton('bioinformationCompleted');
		bropRequestDetailsService.getData(sessionId, requestId, approvalId).then(handleResponse, handleError);
	};
	
	/* local functions */
    function handleRequestDataResponse(results) {
        $scope.myData = results;
        $scope.count = results.length;
        if ($scope.count == 0) {
			$scope.hasData = false;
            $('#bioinformatician_complete_view_table').hide();
        } else {
			$scope.hasData = true;
            $('#bioinformatician_complete_view_table').show();
        }
		$scope.$apply();
    }
	
	function getSearchParameters() {
		return {userId: userId, desc: bropConstantsService.getCatItemDesc() };
	}
	
	function handleResponse() {
		$scope.$apply(); 
	}
		
	function handleError(error) {
        alert('ERROR: ' + error);
	}
	
	function getData() {
		var searchParams = getSearchParameters();
		bropAnalysisCompletedService.getData(sessionId, searchParams)
		.then(handleRequestDataResponse, handleError);
	}
	
	/* initialization */
	$('#bioinformatician_complete_view_table').hide();
    $scope.myData = [];
	if ($scope.canView) {
		getData();
	 }
	
	spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "sysapproval_approver", "", function() {  
		getData();
	});	
	
	
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css/><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>danc</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>DCEG Analysis Completed</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var session_id = gs.getSessionToken();
	var userId = gs.getUserID();
	var user = gs.getUser();
	var canView = user.isMemberOf('DCEG_BIOINFORMATIC');

	data.info = {
		userId: userId,
		sessionId: session_id,
		canView: canView
	};	

})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-14 21:21:39</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>4e845bd1dbdc1f40f59974131f961996</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DCEG Analysis Completed</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_4e845bd1dbdc1f40f59974131f961996</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-22 21:49:52</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<brop-panel ng-if="canView && hasData"></brop-panel>]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>bropConstantsService</name><script><![CDATA[function bropConstantsService() {
this.applicationName = "BROP"; this.catItemDesc = "DCEG Resource Requisition Application"; this.names = ["name", "requestDate", "projectName", "casCode", "projectId", "trcNumber", "needDate", "requestDescription", "technologyNeed", "whereRun", "otherPlace", "whereStore", "size", "fileFormat", "listDeliverables", "listCollaborators", "imputation", "hpvAnalysis", "matrix", "gwas", "predixan", "ase", "rnaseq", "gwasEnrich", "idsc", "vcf", "pencnv", "gcta", "otherTask", "otherTaskValue", "explanation"];
this.textFields = ["name", "requestDate", "projectName", "casCode", "projectId", "trcNumber", "needDate", "requestDescription", "technologyNeed", "whereRun", "otherPlace", "whereStore", "size", "fileFormat", "listDeliverables", "listCollaborators", "otherTaskValue", "explanation"];
this.checkboxes = ["imputation", "hpvAnalysis", "matrix", "gwas", "predixan", "ase", "rnaseq", "gwasEnrich", "idsc", "vcf", "pencnv", "gcta", "otherTask"]; this.itemIdArray = null; this.cat_item_id = ""; this.bioMemberOption = "";
this.imageData = 'data:image/jpeg;base64,'; this.getApplicationName = function() {return this.applicationName;}; this.getCatItemDesc = function() {return this.catItemDesc;}; this.getNames = function() {return this.names;}; this.getTextFields = function() {return this.textFields;}; this.getCheckboxes = function() {return this.checkboxes;}; this.getImageData = function() {return this.imageData;}; this.getCatItemId = function() {return this.cat_item_id;}; this.getBioMemberOption = function() { return this.bioMemberOption; }; this.getItemIdArray = function() { return this.itemIdArray; }; this.setCatItemId = function(val) {this.cat_item_id = val; }; this.setBioMemberOption = function(val) {this.bioMemberOption = val; }; this.setItemIdArray = function(val) {this.itemIdArray = val; }; }]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-01 14:42:32</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>791c3a05db0c5340f59974131f96193d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>31</sys_mod_count><sys_name>bropConstantsService</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_791c3a05db0c5340f59974131f96193d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-14 17:36:28</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_b52638f8db50db40f59974131f9619d8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope, spUtil, bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService, bropRequestDetailsService, bropActionControlService, bropConstantsService) {
	/* widget controller */
	var c = this;

	/* data from server */
	var sessionId = c.data.info.sessionId;
	var userId = c.data.info.userId;
	$scope.canView = c.data.info.canView;
	
	/* local variables */
    var method = "secretaryReviewed";
	
	/* scope variables and functions */
	$scope.panelInfo = { 
		tableId: 'secretary_reviewed_table',
		panelHeadingId: 'heading_secretaryReviewedItems', 
		collapseTarget: 'collapseSecretaryReviewedItems', 
		panelTitle: 'Proposals Reviewed by Executive Secretary' 
	};
	
 	$scope.paginationId = "secretaryReviewedDataPagination";
	
	$scope.tableColumns = [
		{'name': 'number', 'text': 'BROP ID',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_number'},
		{'name': 'name', 'text': 'Principal Investigator',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'projectName', 'text': 'Project Name',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedBy', 'text': 'Submitted By',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedDate', 'text': 'Submitted Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'stage', 'text': 'Status',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'status', 'text': 'Previous Status',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'actions', 'text': 'Actions',  'sortable': false}
	];
	
	$scope.actions = [ 
		{ 'type': 'button', 'action': 'displayDetails(data.requestId, data.approvalId);', 'text': 'View' },			   
		{ 'type': 'link', 'action': '$sp.do?id=dceg_report_page&sys_id={{data.requestId}}', 'text': 'Export' }	
	];
	
	 $scope.sort=function(keyname){	
			$scope.sortKey = keyname;
			$scope.reverse = !$scope.reverse;
	 };
	
	$scope.displayDetails = function(id, approvalId){
		bropActionControlService.showActionButton('pi');
		bropRequestDetailsService.getData(sessionId, id, approvalId).then(handleResponse, handleError);
	};	
	
	/* local functions */
    function handleRequestDataResponse(results) {
		    $scope.myData = results;
        $scope.count = results.length;
        if ($scope.count == 0) {
			$scope.hasData = false;
            $('#secretary_reviewed_table').hide();
        } else {
			$scope.hasData = true;
            $('#secretary_reviewed_table').show();
        }
		$scope.$apply();
    }
	
	function getSearchParameters() {
		return {type: method, userId: userId, catDesc: bropConstantsService.getCatItemDesc() };
	}
	
	function handleResponse() {
		$scope.$apply(); 
	}
		
	function handleError(error) {
        alert('ERROR: ' + JSON.stringify(error));
	}
	
	function getData() {
		var searchParams = getSearchParameters();
		bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService.getData(sessionId, searchParams)
		.then(handleRequestDataResponse, handleError);
	}
	
	/* initialization */
	$('#secretary_reviewed_table').hide();
    $scope.myData = [];
	if ($scope.canView) {
		getData();
	 }
	
	spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "sysapproval_approver", "", function() {  
		getData();
	});	
	
	
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css/><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>drbes</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>DCEG Reviewed By Executive Secretary</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var session_id = gs.getSessionToken();
	var userId = gs.getUserID();
	var user = gs.getUser();
	var canView = user.isMemberOf('DCEG_SECRETARY');

	data.info = {
		userId: userId,
		sessionId: session_id,
		canView: canView
	};	

})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-12 20:34:19</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>b52638f8db50db40f59974131f9619d8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>37</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DCEG Reviewed By Executive Secretary</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_b52638f8db50db40f59974131f9619d8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-22 21:58:28</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<brop-panel ng-if="canView && hasData"></brop-panel>        ]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_a6e0f565db140f00f59974131f9619a2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getAll</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

	var jsonArr = [];
    var sysId = request.queryParams.sysId;
	
	var gr = new GlideRecord('u_data_center_optimization_initiative');
	var year = request.queryParams.year;
	var quarter = request.queryParams.quarter;
	gr.addQuery('u_closing_year', year);
	gr.addQuery('u_closing_quarter', quarter);
	
	gr.query();
	var gru = new GlideRecordUtil();
	while(gr.next()){
		var fieldNames = gru.getFields(gr);
		var item = {};
		for (var i = 0; i <= fieldNames.length; i++) {
			var fieldName = fieldNames[i];
			item[fieldName] = gr.getValue(fieldName);
		}
		jsonArr.push(item);
	}
	
	response.setContentType('application/json');
	
	return jsonArr; 
	

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/dcoiapi/getAll</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getAll</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>false</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-07-31 12:34:08</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>a6e0f565db140f00f59974131f9619a2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getAll</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_a6e0f565db140f00f59974131f9619a2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-18 21:34:29</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Utilization">fc90f165db140f00f59974131f961922</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_38062d5edb73cb0054d8ff621f961969
sys_update_xml.payload:
Are you sure you want to delete this draft?
"); $('#removeDraftDiv').modal('show'); } $scope.removeDraftRecord = function(){ $('#removeDraftDiv').modal('hide'); callDeleteSave(); } $scope.closeRequestConfirm = function(){ $('#removeDraftDiv').modal('hide'); } function callDeleteSave(){ var data = getDeleteParam(); var param = JSON.stringify(data); var request = { url: '/api/naci/processdata/savedata', method: 'POST', beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); }, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, data: param }; $http(request).then(handleResponse, handleError); function handleResponse(response){ var result = response.data.result; } function handleError(response){ console.error(response); alert('ERROR'); } } function getDeleteParam(){ var variables ={}; variables.action = 'delete'; variables.user_id = userId; variables.applicationName = applicationName; variables.savedId = recId; return [variables]; } function loadSavedDetails(id){ clearForm(); $('#resubmit').hide(); $('#submit').show(); $('#save').show(); getSavedRequestById(id); } function getSavedRequestById(id){ var request = { url: '/api/naci/getdata/getDataById', method: 'GET', beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); }, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, params: {savedId: id} }; $http(request).then(handleResponse, handleError); function handleResponse(response){ var variables = response.data.result[0].variable; for(key in variables){ if(textFields.indexOf(key) > -1){ if(key == 'requestDate' || key == 'needDate'){ $('#'+key).val(getConvertedValue(variables[key], 1)); }else{ $('#'+key).val(variables[key]); if(key == 'whereRun'){ if(variables[key] == 'other'){ $('#otherPlace').show(); }else{ $('#otherPlace').hide(); } } } }else{ if(variables[key] == 'true'){ $('#'+key).prop('checked', true); if(key == 'otherTask'){ $('#otherTaskValue').prop('disabled', false); } }else{ $('#'+key).prop('checked', false); } } } $('#hideValue').val(id); $('#newProposal').modal('show'); } function handleError(response){ console.error(response); alert('ERROR'); } } function clearForm(){ for(var index=0; index < names.length; index++) { if(textFields.indexOf(names[index]) != -1 ){ $('#'+names[index]).val(''); }else{ $('#'+names[index]).prop('checked', false); } } $('#otherTaskValue').prop('disabled', true); $('#otherPlace').hide(); } function getConvertedValue(value, flag){ if(!value || 0 == value.length){ return ""; } var values = ''; if(flag == '0'){ values = value.split('/'); return values[0]+'-'+values[1] + '-' + values[2]; }else { values = value.split('-'); return values[0]+'/'+values[1] + '/' + values[2]; } } spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "u_dceg_rrs_saved_request", "", function(name, data) { spUtil.update($scope); }); }]]>csp_instancefalseddptfalseDCEG Draft Proposal Table falsefalsesp_widgetzhoujim@nih.gov2018-01-23 19:22:09false38062d5edb73cb0054d8ff621f96196974DCEG Draft Proposal Table globalfalseglobalsp_widget_38062d5edb73cb0054d8ff621f961969yankovsr@nih.gov2018-02-22 22:12:13

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_20872691db5c1f40f59974131f961956
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope, spUtil, bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService, bropRequestDetailsService, bropActionControlService, bropConstantsService) {
    /* widget controller */	
    var c = this;
	
	/* data from server */
  var sessionId = c.data.info.sessionId;
  var userId = c.data.info.userId;
  $scope.canView = c.data.info.canView;
	
	/* local variables */
    var method = "secretaryFinal";
	
	/* scope variables and functions */
	$scope.panelInfo = { tableId: 'secretary_final_view_table', 
						 panelHeadingId: 'heading_finalViewItems', 
						 collapseTarget: 'collapseFinalViewItems', 
						 panelTitle: 'Proposals Waiting for Executive Secretary Consolidating Revisions' 
					   };
	
	$scope.tableColumns = [
		{'name': 'number', 'text': 'BROP ID',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_number'},
		{'name': 'name', 'text': 'Principal Investigator',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'projectName', 'text': 'Project Name',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedBy', 'text': 'Submitted By',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedDate', 'text': 'Submitted Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'stage', 'text': 'Status',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'lastUpdateDate', 'text': 'Last Update Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'actions', 'text': 'Actions',  'sortable': false}
	];

	$scope.paginationId = "finalViewDataPagination";
	
	$scope.actions = [ 
		{ 'type': 'button', 'action': 'displayDetails(data.requestId, data.approvalId);', 'text': 'View' },			   
		{ 'type': 'link', 'action': '$sp.do?id=dceg_report_page&sys_id={{data.requestId}}', 'text': 'Export' }	
	];
	
	$scope.sort = function(keyname) {		
		$scope.sortKey = keyname;
		$scope.reverse = !scope.reverse;
	};	
	
	$scope.displayDetails = function(id, approvalId){
		bropActionControlService.showActionButton('secretaryFinal');
		bropRequestDetailsService.getData(sessionId, id, approvalId).then(handleResponse, handleError);
	};	
	

	/* local functions */
    function handleRequestDataResponse(results) {
        $scope.myData = results;
        $scope.count = results.length;
        if ($scope.count == 0) {
			$scope.hasData = false;
            $('#secretary_final_view_table').hide();
        } else {
			$scope.hasData = true;
            $('#secretary_final_view_table').show();
        }
		$scope.$apply();
    }
		
	function getSearchParameters() {
		
		return {type: method, userId: userId, catDesc: bropConstantsService.getCatItemDesc() };
	}
	
	function handleResponse() {
		$scope.$apply(); 
	}
		
	function handleError(error) {
        alert('ERROR: ' + JSON.stringify(error));
  }
	
	function getData() {
		var searchParams = getSearchParameters();
		bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService.getData(sessionId, searchParams)
		.then(handleRequestDataResponse, handleError);
	}
	
	/* initialization */
  $('#secretary_final_view_table').hide();
  $scope.myData = [];
	if ($scope.canView) {
		 getData();
	}
	
	spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "sysapproval_approver", "", function() {  
		getData();
	});	
	
}
]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css/><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description>Table displaying proposals for initial review by executive secretary</description><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>descr</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>DCEG Exec Sec Consolidating Revisions</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
  var session_id = gs.getSessionToken();
	var userId = gs.getUserID();
	var user = gs.getUser();
	var canView = user.isMemberOf('DCEG_SECRETARY');

	data.info = {
		userId: userId,
		sessionId: session_id,
		canView: canView
	};	
	
})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-14 18:04:57</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>20872691db5c1f40f59974131f961956</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DCEG Exec Sec Consolidating Revisions</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_20872691db5c1f40f59974131f961956</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-22 21:53:51</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<brop-panel ng-if="canView && hasData"></brop-panel>]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope, spUtil, bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService, bropRequestDetailsService, bropActionControlService, bropConstantsService) {
	/* widget controller */
	var c = this;

	/* data from server */
	var sessionId = c.data.info.sessionId;
	var userId = c.data.info.userId;
	$scope.canView = c.data.info.canView;
	
	/* local variables */
    var method = "bioinformationProgress";
	
	/* scope variables and functions */
	$scope.panelInfo = { 
		tableId: 'bioinformatician_progress_view_table',
		panelHeadingId: 'heading_bioinformaticianProgressViewItems', 
		collapseTarget: 'collapseBioinformaticainProgressViewItems', 
		panelTitle: 'Analysis in Progress' 
	};
	
 	$scope.paginationId = "bioinformaticianProgressViewDataPagination";
	
	$scope.tableColumns = [
		{'name': 'number', 'text': 'BROP ID',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_number'},
		{'name': 'name', 'text': 'Principal Investigator',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'projectName', 'text': 'Project Name',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedBy', 'text': 'Submitted By',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedDate', 'text': 'Submitted Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'stage', 'text': 'Status',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'lastUpdateDate', 'text': 'Last Update Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'estimateHour', 'text': 'Estimated Hours',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'actions', 'text': 'Actions',  'sortable': false}
	];
	
	$scope.actions = [ 
		{ 'type': 'button', 'action': 'completeAnalysis(data.requestId, data.approvalId);', 'text': 'View' },	
		{ 'type': 'button', 'action': 'transfer(data.requestId, data.approvalId);', 'text': 'Transfer'},
		{ 'type': 'link', 'action': '$sp.do?id=dceg_report_page&sys_id={{data.requestId}}', 'text': 'Export' }	
	];
	
	 $scope.sort=function(keyname){	
			$scope.sortKey = keyname;
			$scope.reverse = !$scope.reverse;
	 };
	
	$scope.completeAnalysis = function(requestId, approvalId) {
		bropActionControlService.showActionButton('bioinformationProgress');
		bropRequestDetailsService.getData(sessionId, requestId, approvalId).then(handleResponse, handleError);
	};
	
	$scope.transfer = function(requestId, approvalId) { 
		bropActionControlService.showActionButton('bioTransfer');
		bropRequestDetailsService.getData(sessionId, requestId, approvalId).then(handleResponse, handleError);
	};
	
	/* local functions */
    function handleRequestDataResponse(results) {
        $scope.myData = results;
        $scope.count = results.length;
        if ($scope.count == 0) {
			$scope.hasData = false;
            $('#bioinformatician_progress_view_table').hide();
        } else {
			$scope.hasData = true;
            $('#bioinformatician_progress_view_table').show();
        }
		$scope.$apply();
    }
	
	function getSearchParameters() {
		return {type: method, userId: userId, catDesc: bropConstantsService.getCatItemDesc() };
	}
	
	function handleResponse() {
		$scope.$apply(); 
	}
		
	function handleError(error) {
        alert('ERROR: ' + error);
	}
	
	function getData() {
		var searchParams = getSearchParameters();
		bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService.getData(sessionId, searchParams)
		.then(handleRequestDataResponse, handleError);
	}
	
	/* initialization */
	$('#bioinformatician_progress_view_table').hide();
    $scope.myData = [];
	if ($scope.canView) {
		getData();
	 }
	
	spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "sysapproval_approver", "", function() {  
		getData();
	});	
	
	
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css/><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>daip</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>DCEG Analysis in Progress</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var session_id = gs.getSessionToken();
	var userId = gs.getUserID();
	var user = gs.getUser();
	var canView = user.isMemberOf('DCEG_BIOINFORMATIC');

	data.info = {
		userId: userId,
		sessionId: session_id,
		canView: canView
	};	

})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-14 20:27:29</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>e4288fd5db9c1f40f59974131f96193e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DCEG Analysis in Progress</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_e4288fd5db9c1f40f59974131f96193e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-22 21:50:58</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<brop-panel ng-if="canView && hasData"></brop-panel>]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>bropAllRequestsService</name><script><![CDATA[function bropAllRequestsService($http) {

    this.getData = function (sessionId) {

        return new Promise(function (resolve, reject) {
            var request = {
                url: '/api/naci/getdata/getAllBROPRequests',
                method: 'GET',
                beforeSend: function (xhr) { xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); },
                headers: {
                    'Content-Type': 'application/json'
                }
            };
            $http(request).then(
				function (response) {
					resolve (response.data.result);				
			}, function (error) {
				reject(error);
			});			
        });
	};
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-15 20:46:06</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>87c554fddb1c5f40f59974131f9619a7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>bropAllRequestsService</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_87c554fddb1c5f40f59974131f9619a7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-15 20:51:53</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

Are you sure you want to resubmit this proposal?
"); $('#resubmitRequestDiv').modal('show'); } $scope.submitRequest = function(){ clearError(); var variables = getProposalData(); var currentDate = new Date().toLocaleDateString(); variables[0].requestDate = getConvertedValue(currentDate, 0); var error = validateTextField(variables[0]); var error1 = validateCheckbox(variables[0]); if(error.length > 0 || error1.length > 0){ if(error.length > 0){ showError(error); } if(error1.length > 0){ showError(error1); } $('#submitRequestDiv').modal('hide').on('hidden.bs.modal', function() { $('body').addClass('modal-open') }); moveToTop(); }else{ disableButtons(); variables[0].requested_for = userId; variables[0].opened_by = userId; variables[0].cat_item = cat_item_id; variables[0].short_description ="DCEG Resource requisition System - BROP"; variables[0].contact_type="Web"; variables[0].variables = itemIdArray; var param = JSON.stringify(variables); $('#submitRequestDiv').modal('hide').on('hidden.bs.modal', function() { $('body').addClass('modal-open') }); sendSubmitRequest(param); } } $scope.resubmitRequest = function(){ $('#resubmitRequestDiv').modal('hide').on('hidden.bs.modal', function() { $('body').addClass('modal-open'); }) var trackData = {}; clearError(); var variables = getProposalData(); var error = validateTextField(variables[0]); var error1 = validateCheckbox(variables[0]); if(error.length > 0 || error1.length > 0){ if(error.length > 0){ showError(error); } if(error1.length > 0){ showError(error1); } closeRequestConfirm(); moveToTop(); }else{ var requestId = $('#hideRequestId').val(); var ticketNumber = $('#hideTicketNum').val(); trackData.requestId = requestId; trackData.ticker_num = ticketNumber; var param = JSON.stringify(trackData); $.ajax({ dataType: "json", type: "POST", contentType: "application/json", url: "/api/naci/processdata/processTrackData", beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); }, data: param, async: false, success: function(data){ resubmitData(requestId); }, error: function(data){ alert("ERROR"); } }); } } function resubmitData(orgin_req_id){ var variables = getProposalData(); var currentDate = new Date().toLocaleDateString(); variables[0].requestDate = getConvertedValue(currentDate, 0); variables[0].requested_for = userId; variables[0].opened_by = userId; variables[0].cat_item = cat_item_id; variables[0].short_description ="DCEG Resource requisition System - BROP"; variables[0].contact_type=orgin_req_id.toString(); variables[0].variables = itemIdArray; var preComments = $('#hideComments').val(); if(preComments.length >= 50){ var index = preComments.indexOf('Added comment to Approval record:'); preComments = preComments.substring(index); } variables[0].comments = preComments; var param = JSON.stringify(variables); $.ajax({ dataType: "json", type: "POST", contentType: "application/json", url: "/api/naci/processdata/submitRequestData", beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); }, data: param, success: function(data){ $('#newProposal').modal('hide'); }, error: function(data){ alert("ERROR"); } }); } function sendSubmitRequest(param){ var request = { url: '/api/naci/processdata/submitRequestData', method: 'POST', beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); }, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, data: param }; $http(request).then(handleResponse, handleError); function handleResponse(response){ var hideValue = $('#hideValue').val(); if(hideValue != null && hideValue.trim() != '' && hideValue != "none"){ deleteSavedData(); } } function handleError(response){ console.error(response); alert('ERROR'); } $('#newProposal').modal('hide'); } $scope.closeRequestConfirm = function(){ $('#submitRequestDiv').modal('hide').on('hidden.bs.modal', function() { $('body').addClass('modal-open'); }) } $scope.closeResubmitConfirm = function(){ $('#resubmitRequestDiv').modal('hide').on('hidden.bs.modal', function() { $('body').addClass('modal-open'); }) } $scope.saveRequest = function(){ var variables = getProposalData(); variables[0].user_id = userId; variables[0].applicationName = applicationName; var existId = $('#hideValue').val(); if(existId != 'none'){ variables[0].action = 'update'; variables[0].savedId = existId; }else{ variables[0].action = 'add'; } var param = JSON.stringify(variables); var request = { url: '/api/naci/processdata/savedata', method: 'POST', beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); }, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, data: param }; $http(request).then(handleResponse, handleError); function handleResponse(response){ var result = response.data.result; } function handleError(response){ console.error(response); alert('ERROR'); } $('#newProposal').modal('hide'); } function getProposalData(){ var variables= {}; for(var index=0; index < names.length; index++) { if(textFields.indexOf(names[index]) > -1){ var value = $('#'+names[index]).val(); if(names[index].indexOf('Date') > 0){ value = getConvertedValue(value, '0'); } variables[names[index]] = value; }else{ if($('#'+names[index]).is(':checked')){ variables[names[index]] = 'true'; }else{ variables[names[index]] = 'false'; } } } return [variables]; } function getConvertedValue(value, flag){ if(!value || 0 == value.length){ return ""; } var values = ''; if(flag == '0'){ values = value.split('/'); return values[0]+'-'+values[1] + '-' + values[2]; }else { values = value.split('-'); return values[0]+'/'+values[1] + '/' + values[2]; } } $window.valueChange = function(){ var location = $('#whereRun').val(); if(location == 'other'){ $('#otherPlace').show(); }else{ $('#otherPlace').val(''); $('#otherPlace').hide(); } } function clearError(){ $('#errorMessage').html(""); $('#errorMessage').hide(); for(i = 0; i < textFields.length; i++){ $('#'+textFields[i]).css("background-color",""); } $('#err').css("background-color",""); $('#otherTaskValue').css("background-color",""); } function validateTextField(variables){ var error = []; //validate textFields first for (var i = 0; i < textFields.length; i++){ if(textFields[i] != 'needDate' && textFields[i] != 'explanation' && textFields[i] != 'projectId' && textFields[i] != 'requestDate' ){ var value = variables[textFields[i]]; if(textFields[i] == 'whereRun'){ if(variables.whereRun == null){ value = ''; } }else{ value = value.trim(); } if(textFields[i] == 'otherPlace'){ if(variables.whereRun == "other"){ if(value.length == 0){ error.push(textFields[i]); } } }else if(value.length == 0){ if(textFields[i] != 'otherTaskValue'){ error.push(textFields[i]); } } } } return error; } function validateCheckbox(variables){ var error=[]; var selected = ''; for(var i = 0; i < checkboxs.length; i++){ if(variables[checkboxs[i]] == 'true'){ selected = 'true'; break; }else{ selected = 'false'; } } if(selected == 'false'){ error.push('err'); }else{ if(variables.otherTask == 'true'){ if(variables.otherTaskValue.trim().length == 0){ error.push('otherTaskValue'); } } } return error; } function moveToTop(){ var container = $('#newProposal'), scrollTo = $('#anchor'); container.scrollTop(scrollTo.offset().top - container.offset().top + container.scrollTop()); container.animate({scrollTop: scrollTo.offset().top - container.offset().top + container.scrollTop()}); } function disableButtons(){ $('#submit').attr('disabled', 'disabled'); $('#save').attr('disabled', 'disabled'); $('#cancel').attr('disabled', 'disabled'); } function deleteSavedData(){ var variables = prepareParam(); var param = JSON.stringify(variables); var request = { url: '/api/naci/processdata/savedata', method: 'POST', beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); }, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, data: param }; $http(request).then(handleResponse, handleError); function handleResponse(response){ var result = response.data.result; } function handleError(response){ console.error(response); alert('ERROR'); } } function prepareParam(){ var variables ={}; variables.action = 'delete'; variables.user_id = userId; variables.applicationName = applicationName; variables.savedId = $('#hideValue').val(); return [variables]; } function showError(error){ $('#errorMessage').html(" Please fill in data into highlight area."); $('#errorMessage').show(); for(var i = 0; i < error.length; i++){ $('#'+error[i]).css("background-color","yellow"); } } }]]>csp_instanceThis is a template for DCEG data inputfalsednpfalseDCEG New Proposalfalsefalsesp_widgetzhoujim@nih.gov2018-01-23 19:00:42false8a11a19adb73cb0054d8ff621f961924135DCEG New Proposalglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_8a11a19adb73cb0054d8ff621f961924zhoujim@nih.gov2018-02-15 21:57:58

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_36a458acdb401340f59974131f9619f2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope, spUtil, bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService, bropRequestDetailsService, bropActionControlService, bropConstantsService) {
    /* widget controller */	
    var c = this;
	
	/* data from server */
  var sessionId = c.data.info.sessionId;
  var userId = c.data.info.userId;
  $scope.canView = c.data.info.canView;
	
	/* local variables */
    var method = "init";
	
	/* scope variables and functions */
	$scope.panelInfo = { tableId: 'secretary_init_table', 
						 panelHeadingId: 'heading_secretaryViewItems', 
						 collapseTarget: 'collapseSecrettaryViewItems', 
						 panelTitle: 'Proposals Waiting for Executive Secretary Initial Quality Control Check' 
					   };
	
	$scope.tableColumns = [
		{'name': 'number', 'text': 'BROP ID',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_number'},
		{'name': 'name', 'text': 'Principal Investigator',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'projectName', 'text': 'Project Name',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedBy', 'text': 'Submitted By',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedDate', 'text': 'Submitted Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'stage', 'text': 'Status',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'lastUpdateDate', 'text': 'Last Update Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'actions', 'text': 'Actions',  'sortable': false}
	];

	$scope.paginationId = "secretaryViewDataPagination";
	
	$scope.actions = [ 
		{ 'type': 'button', 'action': 'displayDetails(data.requestId, data.approvalId);', 'text': 'View' },			   
		{ 'type': 'link', 'action': '$sp.do?id=dceg_report_page&sys_id={{data.requestId}}', 'text': 'Export' }	
	];
	
	$scope.sort = function(keyname) {		
		$scope.sortKey = keyname;
		$scope.reverse = !scope.reverse;
	};	
	
	$scope.displayDetails = function(id, approvalId){
		bropActionControlService.showActionButton('secretary');
		bropRequestDetailsService.getData(sessionId, id, approvalId).then(handleResponse, handleError);
	};	
	

	/* local functions */
    function handleRequestDataResponse(results) {
        $scope.myData = results;
        $scope.count = results.length;
        if ($scope.count == 0) {
			$scope.hasData = false;
            $('#secretary_init_table').hide();
        } else {
			$scope.hasData = true;
            $('#secretary_init_table').show();
        }
		$scope.$apply();
    }
		
	function getSearchParameters() {
		
		return {type: method, userId: userId, catDesc: bropConstantsService.getCatItemDesc() };
	}
	
	function handleResponse() {
		$scope.$apply(); 
	}
		
	function handleError(error) {
        alert('ERROR: ' + JSON.stringify(error));
  }
	
	function getData() {
		var searchParams = getSearchParameters();
		bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService.getData(sessionId, searchParams)
		.then(handleRequestDataResponse, handleError);
	}
	
	/* initialization */
	$('#secretary_init_table').hide();
  $scope.myData = [];
	if ($scope.canView) {
		 getData();
	}
	
	spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "sysapproval_approver", "", function() {  
		getData();
	});	
	
}
]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css/><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description>Table displaying proposals for initial review by executive secretary</description><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>diqcc</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>DCEG Initial Control Check</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
  var session_id = gs.getSessionToken();
	var userId = gs.getUserID();
	var user = gs.getUser();
	var canView = user.isMemberOf('DCEG_SECRETARY');

	data.info = {
		userId: userId,
		sessionId: session_id,
		canView: canView
	};	
	
})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-30 13:14:27</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>36a458acdb401340f59974131f9619f2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>208</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DCEG Initial Control Check</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_36a458acdb401340f59974131f9619f2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-22 21:56:08</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<brop-panel ng-if="canView && hasData"></brop-panel>]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_1f0f32d1db9c1f40f59974131f9619f5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope, spUtil, bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService, bropRequestDetailsService, bropActionControlService, bropConstantsService) {
	/* widget controller */
	var c = this;

	/* data from server */
	var sessionId = c.data.info.sessionId;
	var userId = c.data.info.userId;
	$scope.canView = c.data.info.canView;
	
	/* local variables */
    var method = "committee";
	
	/* scope variables and functions */
	$scope.panelInfo = { 
		tableId: 'committee_view_table',
		panelHeadingId: 'heading_committeeViewItems', 
		collapseTarget: 'collapsecommitteeViewItems', 
		panelTitle: 'Proposals Waiting for Full Committee Review' 
	};
	
 	$scope.paginationId = "committeeViewDataPagination";
	
	$scope.tableColumns = [
		{'name': 'number', 'text': 'BROP ID',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_number'},
		{'name': 'name', 'text': 'Principal Investigator',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'projectName', 'text': 'Project Name',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedBy', 'text': 'Submitted By',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedDate', 'text': 'Submitted Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'stage', 'text': 'Status',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'lastUpdateDate', 'text': 'Last Update Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'actions', 'text': 'Actions',  'sortable': false}
	];
	
	$scope.actions = [ 
		{ 'type': 'button', 'action': 'displayDetails(data.requestId, data.approvalId);', 'text': 'View' },			   
		{ 'type': 'link', 'action': '$sp.do?id=dceg_report_page&sys_id={{data.requestId}}', 'text': 'Export' }	
	];
	
	 $scope.sort=function(keyname){	
			$scope.sortKey = keyname;
			$scope.reverse = !$scope.reverse;
	 };
	
	$scope.displayDetails = function(id, approvalId){
		bropActionControlService.showActionButton('committee');
		bropRequestDetailsService.getData(sessionId, id, approvalId).then(handleResponse, handleError);
	};	
	
	/* local functions */
    function handleRequestDataResponse(results) {
        $scope.myData = results;
        $scope.count = results.length;
        if ($scope.count == 0) {
			$scope.hasData = false;
            $('#committee_view_table').hide();
        } else {
			$scope.hasData = true;
            $('#committee_view_table').show();
        }
		$scope.$apply();
    }
	
	function getSearchParameters() {
		return {type: method, userId: userId, catDesc: bropConstantsService.getCatItemDesc() };
	}
	
	function handleResponse() {
		$scope.$apply(); 
	}
		
	function handleError(error) {
        alert('ERROR: ' + error);
	}
	
	function getData() {
		var searchParams = getSearchParameters();
		bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService.getData(sessionId, searchParams)
		.then(handleRequestDataResponse, handleError);
	}
	
	/* initialization */
	$('#committee_view_table').hide();
    $scope.myData = [];
	if ($scope.canView) {
		getData();
	 }
	
	spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "sysapproval_approver", "", function() {  
		getData();
	});	
	
	
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css/><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>dwfcr</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>DCEG Waiting for Committee Review</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var session_id = gs.getSessionToken();
	var userId = gs.getUserID();
	var user = gs.getUser();
	var canView = user.isMemberOf('DCEG_COMMITTEE');

	data.info = {
		userId: userId,
		sessionId: session_id,
		canView: canView
	};	

})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-14 19:47:49</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>1f0f32d1db9c1f40f59974131f9619f5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DCEG Waiting for Committee Review</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_1f0f32d1db9c1f40f59974131f9619f5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-22 21:47:20</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<brop-panel ng-if="canView && hasData"></brop-panel>        ]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope, spUtil, bropAllRequestsService, bropRequestDetailsService, bropActionControlService, bropConstantsService) {
	/* widget controller */
	var c = this;

	/* data from server */
	var sessionId = c.data.info.sessionId;
	var userId = c.data.info.userId;
	$scope.canView = c.data.info.canView;
		
	/* scope variables and functions */
	$scope.panelInfo = { 
		tableId: 'admin_view_table',
		panelHeadingId: 'heading_adminViewItems', 
		collapseTarget: 'collapseAdminViewItems', 
		panelTitle: 'All Bioinformatics Resource Oversight Panel Requests' 
	};
	
 	$scope.paginationId = "adminViewDataPagination";
	
	$scope.tableColumns = [
		{'name': 'number', 'text': 'BROP ID',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_number'},
		{'name': 'name', 'text': 'Principal Investigator',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'projectName', 'text': 'Project Name',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedBy', 'text': 'Submitted By',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedDate', 'text': 'Submitted Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'stage', 'text': 'Status',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'estimate', 'text': 'Estimated Hours',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'actual', 'text': 'Actual Hours',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'lastUpdateDate', 'text': 'Last Update Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'actions', 'text': 'Actions',  'sortable': false}
	];
	
	$scope.actions = [ 
		{ 'type': 'button', 'action': 'displayDetails(data.sysId);', 'text': 'View' }
	];
	
	 $scope.sort=function(keyname){	
			$scope.sortKey = keyname;
			$scope.reverse = !$scope.reverse;
	 };
	
	$scope.displayDetails = function(requestId) {
		bropActionControlService.showActionButton('pi');
		bropRequestDetailsService.getData(sessionId, requestId).then(handleResponse, handleError);
	};

	
	/* local functions */
    function handleRequestDataResponse(results) {
        $scope.myData = results;
        $scope.count = results.length;
        if ($scope.count == 0) {
			$scope.hasData = false;
            $('#admin_view_table').hide();
        } else {
			$scope.hasData = true;
            $('#admin_view_table').show();
        }
		$scope.$apply();
    }
	
	function getSearchParameters() {
		return {type: method, userId: userId, catDesc: bropConstantsService.getCatItemDesc() };
	}
	
	function handleResponse() {
		$scope.$apply(); 
	}
		
	function handleError(error) {
        alert('ERROR: ' + error);
	}
	
	function getData() {
		bropAllRequestsService.getData(sessionId)
		.then(handleRequestDataResponse, handleError);
	}
	
	/* initialization */
	$('#admin_view_table').hide();
    $scope.myData = [];
	if ($scope.canView) {
		getData();
	 }
	
	spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "sysapproval_approver", "", function() {  
		getData();
	});	
	
	
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css/><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>dcegav</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>DCEG Admin View</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var session_id = gs.getSessionToken();
	var userId = gs.getUserID();
	var user = gs.getUser();
	var canView = user.isMemberOf('DCEG_ADMIN');

	data.info = {
		userId: userId,
		sessionId: session_id,
		canView: canView
	};	

})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-15 20:39:46</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>da849031db5c5f40f59974131f9619dc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DCEG Admin View</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_da849031db5c5f40f59974131f9619dc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-22 21:48:19</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<brop-panel ng-if="canView && hasData"></brop-panel>]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>

"); $('#confirmationDiv').modal('show'); } $scope.withdraw = function(){ //get all data detail var variables = [{}]; $.ajax({ dataType: "json", type: "GET", url: "/api/naci/getdata/getRequestDetailsById", beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); }, data: {sysId: recId}, async: false, success: function(data){ var obj = data.result[0]; for(var i = 0; i < names.length; i++){ var value = obj[names[i]]; variables[0][names[i]] = value; } var comments = obj.comments; variables[0].comments = comments; }, error: function(data){ alert("ERROR"); } }); variables[0].user_id = userId; variables[0].applicationName = applicationName; variables[0].action = 'add'; var param = JSON.stringify(variables); $.ajax({ dataType: "json", type: "POST", contentType: "application/json", url: "/api/naci/processdata/savedata", beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); }, data: param, async: false, success: function(data){ //window.location.reload(true); }, error: function(data){ alert("ERROR"); } }); $.ajax({ dataType: "json", type: "GET", url: "/api/naci/processdata/withdrawRequest", beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); }, data: {sysId: recId}, async: false, success: function(data){ $('#confirmationDiv').modal('hide'); }, error: function(data){ alert(data); } }); } $scope.resubmitProposal = function(id, ticketNum){ loadResubmitDetail(id, ticketNum); //$scope.$apply(); }; /* local functions */ function handleRequestDataResponse(results) { $scope.myData = results; $scope.count = results.length; if ($scope.count == 0) { $scope.hasData = false; $('#submitted_table').hide(); } else { $scope.hasData = true; $('#submitted_table').show(); } $scope.$apply(); } function getSearchParameters() { return {userId: userId, desc: bropConstantsService.getCatItemDesc() }; } function handleResponse() { $scope.$apply(); } function handleError(error) { alert('ERROR: ' + error); } function getData() { var searchParams = getSearchParameters(); bropSubmittedRequestDataService.getData(sessionId, searchParams) .then(handleRequestDataResponse, handleError); } /* initialization */ $('#submitted_table').hide(); $scope.myData = []; if ($scope.canView) { getData(); } function loadResubmitDetail(id, ticketNum){ $('#commentLength').val('0'); cleanApprovalError(); $.ajax({ dataType: "json", type: "GET", url: "/api/naci/getdata/getRequestDetailsById", beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId)}, data: {sysId: id}, async: false, success: function(data){ var obj = data.result[0]; for(var i = 0; i < textFields.length; i++){ var value = obj[textFields[i]]; if(textFields[i].indexOf('Date') > 0){ value = getConvertedValue(value, "1"); } $('#'+textFields[i]).val(value); } for(var k = 0; k < checkboxs.length; k++){ var value1 = obj[checkboxs[k]]; if(value1 == 'true'){ $('#' + checkboxs[k]).prop('checked', 'cheked'); } } $('#hideRequestId').val(id); var comments = obj.comments; $('#hideComments').val(comments); $('#hideTicketNum').val(ticketNum); $('#save').hide(); $('#submit').hide(); $('#resubmit').show(); $('#newProposal').modal('show'); }, error: function(data){ alert("ERROR"); } }); } function cleanApprovalError(){ $('#errMsg').html(''); $('#commentsText').css("background-color", ""); $('#bioMemberList').css("background-color", ""); $('#actualHour').css("background-color", ""); $('#estimateHour').css("background-color", ""); } function getConvertedValue(value, flag){ if(!value || 0 == value.length){ return ""; } if(flag == '0'){ var values = value.split('/'); return values[0]+'-'+values[1] + '-' + values[2]; }else { var values = value.split('-'); return values[0]+'/'+values[1] + '/' + values[2]; } } spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "sysapproval_approver", "", function() { getData(); }); }]]>csp_instancefalsedcegspfalseDCEG Submitted Proposalsfalsefalsesp_widgetyankovsr@nih.gov2018-02-15 20:07:03falseb20d04b9db1c5f40f59974131f9619bc53DCEG Submitted Proposalsglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_b20d04b9db1c5f40f59974131f9619bcyankovsr@nih.gov2018-02-22 22:05:03

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>bropAnalysisCompletedService</name><script><![CDATA[function bropAnalysisCompletedService($http) {

    this.getData = function (sessionId, searchParams) {

        return new Promise(function (resolve, reject) {
            var request = {
                url: '/api/naci/getdata/getAnalysisCompleteRequestData',
                method: 'GET',
                beforeSend: function (xhr) { xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); },
                headers: {
                    'Content-Type': 'application/json'
                },
                params: searchParams
            };
            $http(request).then(
				function (response) {
					resolve (response.data.result);				
			}, function (error) {
				reject(error);
			});			
        });
	};
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-14 21:31:41</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>64a65b15dbdc1f40f59974131f9619d5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>bropAnalysisCompletedService</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_64a65b15dbdc1f40f59974131f9619d5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-14 21:35:16</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>bropActionControlService</name><script><![CDATA[function bropActionControlService() {
	
	this.showActionButton = function(type){
		//order is important
		if(type=="pi"){
			$('#okDiv').show();
			$('#secretaryActionDiv').hide();
			$('#chairmanActionDiv').hide();
			$('#committeeActionDiv').hide();
			var commentLength = $('#commentLength').val();
			if(commentLength > 5){
				$('#commets').show();
			}else{
				$('#commets').hide();
			}
			$('#bioSelectorId').hide();
			$('#commentTextarea').hide();
			$('#secretaryFinalDiv').hide();
			$('#bioinfoStartProcessDiv').hide();
			$('#bioinfoTransferDiv').hide();
			$('#estimateHourDiv').hide();
			$('#transferActionDiv').hide();
			$('#progressActionDiv').hide();
			$('#actualHourDiv').hide();
		}
		if(type=="secretary"){
			$('#okDiv').hide();
			$('#secretaryActionDiv').show();
			$('#chairmanActionDiv').hide();
			$('#committeeActionDiv').hide();
			$('#secretaryFinalDiv').hide();
			$('#commets').show();
			$('#bioSelectorId').hide();
			$('#commentTextarea').show();
			$('#bioinfoStartProcessDiv').hide();
			$('#bioinfoTransferDiv').hide();
			$('#estimateHourDiv').hide();
			$('#transferActionDiv').hide();
			$('#progressActionDiv').hide();
			$('#actualHourDiv').hide();
		}
		if(type == "committee"){
			$('#okDiv').hide();
			$('#secretaryActionDiv').hide();
			$('#chairmanActionDiv').hide();
			$('#committeeActionDiv').show();
			$('#secretaryFinalDiv').hide();
			$('#commets').show();
			$('#bioSelectorId').hide();
			$('#commentTextarea').show();
			$('#bioinfoStartProcessDiv').hide();
			$('#bioinfoTransferDiv').hide();
			$('#estimateHourDiv').hide();
			$('#transferActionDiv').hide();
			$('#progressActionDiv').hide();
			$('#actualHourDiv').hide();
		}
		if(type == "chairman"){
			$('#okDiv').hide();
			$('#secretaryActionDiv').hide();
			$('#secretaryFinalDiv').hide();
			$('#committeeActionDiv').hide();
			$('#chairmanActionDiv').show();
			$('#commets').show();
			$('#bioSelectorId').show();
			$('#commentTextarea').show();
			$('#bioinfoStartProcessDiv').hide();
			$('#bioinfoTransferDiv').hide();
			$('#estimateHourDiv').hide();
			$('#transferActionDiv').hide();
			$('#progressActionDiv').hide();
			$('#actualHourDiv').hide();
		}
		if(type == "secretaryFinal"){
			$('#okDiv').hide();
			$('#secretaryActionDiv').hide();
			$('#committeeActionDiv').hide();
			$('#chairmanActionDiv').hide();
			$('#secretaryFinalDiv').show();
			$('#commets').show();
			$('#bioSelectorId').hide();
			$('#commentTextarea').show();
			$('#bioinfoStartProcessDiv').hide();
			$('#bioinfoTransferDiv').hide();
			$('#estimateHourDiv').hide();
			$('#transferActionDiv').hide();
			$('#progressActionDiv').hide();
			$('#actualHourDiv').hide();
		}
		if(type =="bioProgress"){
			$('#okDiv').hide();
			$('#secretaryActionDiv').hide();
			$('#committeeActionDiv').hide();
			$('#chairmanActionDiv').hide();
			$('#secretaryFinalDiv').hide();
			$('#commets').show();
			$('#bioSelectorId').hide();
			$('#commentTextarea').hide();
			$('#bioinfoStartProcessDiv').show();
			$('#bioinfoTransferDiv').hide();
			$('#estimateHourDiv').show();
			$('#transferActionDiv').hide();
			$('#progressActionDiv').hide();
			$('#actualHourDiv').hide();
		}
		if(type == "bioTransfer"){
			$('#okDiv').hide();
			$('#secretaryActionDiv').hide();
			$('#committeeActionDiv').hide();
			$('#chairmanActionDiv').hide();
			$('#secretaryFinalDiv').hide();
			$('#commets').show();
			$('#bioSelectorId').hide();
			$('#commentTextarea').show();
			$('#bioinfoStartProcessDiv').hide();
			$('#bioinfoTransferDiv').show();
			$('#estimateHourDiv').hide();
			$('#transferActionDiv').hide();
			$('#progressActionDiv').hide();
			$('#actualHourDiv').hide();
		}
		if(type == "secretaryTransfer"){
			$('#okDiv').hide();
			$('#secretaryActionDiv').hide();
			$('#secretaryFinalDiv').hide();
			$('#committeeActionDiv').hide();
			$('#chairmanActionDiv').hide();
			$('#commets').show();
			$('#bioSelectorId').show();
			$('#commentTextarea').show();
			$('#bioinfoStartProcessDiv').hide();
			$('#bioinfoTransferDiv').hide();
			$('#estimateHourDiv').hide();
			$('#transferActionDiv').show();
			$('#progressActionDiv').hide();
			$('#actualHourDiv').hide();
		}
		if(type == "bioinformationProgress"){
			$('#okDiv').hide();
			$('#secretaryActionDiv').hide();
			$('#committeeActionDiv').hide();
			$('#chairmanActionDiv').hide();
			$('#secretaryFinalDiv').hide();
			$('#commets').show();
			$('#bioSelectorId').hide();
			$('#commentTextarea').hide();
			$('#bioinfoStartProcessDiv').hide();
			$('#bioinfoTransferDiv').hide();
			$('#estimateHourDiv').hide();
			$('#transferActionDiv').hide();
			$('#progressActionDiv').show();
			$('#actualHourDiv').show();
		}
		if(type == 'bioinformationCompleted'){
			$('#okDiv').show();
			$('#secretaryActionDiv').hide();
			$('#committeeActionDiv').hide();
			$('#chairmanActionDiv').hide();
			$('#secretaryFinalDiv').hide();
			$('#commets').show();
			$('#bioSelectorId').hide();
			$('#commentTextarea').hide();
			$('#bioinfoStartProcessDiv').hide();
			$('#bioinfoTransferDiv').hide();
			$('#estimateHourDiv').hide();
			$('#transferActionDiv').hide();
			$('#progressActionDiv').hide();
			$('#actualHourDiv').hide();
		}
	};
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-01 14:37:35</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>ebfab205db0c5340f59974131f961904</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>bropActionControlService</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_ebfab205db0c5340f59974131f961904</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-01 14:37:35</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>
