sys_update_xml.name: sp_angular_provider_399697eddb5c5f4054d8ff621f961945
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>bropBioinformaticianTasksService</name><script><![CDATA[function bropBioinformaticianTasksService($http) {

    this.getData = function (sessionId) {

        return new Promise(function (resolve, reject) {
            var request = {
                url: '/api/naci/getdata/getBioInformaticianTasks',
                method: 'GET',
                beforeSend: function (xhr) { xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); },
                headers: {
                    'Content-Type': 'application/json'
                }
            };
            $http(request).then(
				function (response) {
					resolve (response.data.result);				
			}, function (error) {
				reject(error);
			});			
        });
	};
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-15 16:10:45</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>399697eddb5c5f4054d8ff621f961945</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>bropBioinformaticianTasksService</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_399697eddb5c5f4054d8ff621f961945</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-15 16:10:45</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_angular_provider_beaf443ddb1c5f40f59974131f9619f0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>bropSubmittedRequestDataService</name><script><![CDATA[function bropSubmittedRequestDataService($http) {

    this.getData = function (sessionId, searchParams) {

        return new Promise(function (resolve, reject) {
            var request = {
                url: '/api/naci/getdata/getSubmittedRequestData',
                method: 'GET',
                beforeSend: function (xhr) { xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); },
                headers: {
                    'Content-Type': 'application/json'
                },
                params: searchParams
            };
            $http(request).then(
				function (response) {
					resolve (response.data.result);				
			}, function (error) {
				reject(error);
			});			
        });
	};
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-15 20:19:35</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>beaf443ddb1c5f40f59974131f9619f0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>bropSubmittedRequestDataService</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_beaf443ddb1c5f40f59974131f9619f0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-15 20:19:35</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_2f3f4b9ddb9c1f40f59974131f961933
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope, spUtil, bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService, bropRequestDetailsService, bropActionControlService, bropConstantsService) {
	/* widget controller */
	var c = this;

	/* data from server */
	var sessionId = c.data.info.sessionId;
	var userId = c.data.info.userId;
	$scope.canView = c.data.info.canView;
	
	/* local variables */
    var method = "bioinformatician";
	
	/* scope variables and functions */
	$scope.panelInfo = { 
		tableId: 'bioinformatician_view_table',
		panelHeadingId: 'heading_bioinformaticianViewItems', 
		collapseTarget: 'collapseBioinformaticainViewItems', 
		panelTitle: 'In Bioinformatician\'s Queue' 
	};
	
 	$scope.paginationId = "bioinformaticianProgressViewDataPagination";
	
	$scope.tableColumns = [
		{'name': 'number', 'text': 'BROP ID',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_number'},
		{'name': 'name', 'text': 'Principal Investigator',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'projectName', 'text': 'Project Name',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedBy', 'text': 'Submitted By',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedDate', 'text': 'Submitted Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'stage', 'text': 'Status',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'lastUpdateDate', 'text': 'Last Update Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'actions', 'text': 'Actions',  'sortable': false}
	];
	
	$scope.actions = [ 
		{ 'type': 'button', 'action': 'startProgress(data.requestId, data.approvalId);', 'text': 'View' },	
		{ 'type': 'button', 'action': 'transfer(data.requestId, data.approvalId);', 'text': 'Transfer'},
		{ 'type': 'link', 'action': '$sp.do?id=dceg_report_page&sys_id={{data.requestId}}', 'text': 'Export' }	
	];
	
	 $scope.sort=function(keyname){	
			$scope.sortKey = keyname;
			$scope.reverse = !$scope.reverse;
	 };
	
	$scope.startProgress = function(requestId, approvalId) {
		bropActionControlService.showActionButton('bioProgress');
		bropRequestDetailsService.getData(sessionId, requestId, approvalId).then(handleResponse, handleError);
	};
	
	$scope.transfer = function(requestId, approvalId) { 
		bropActionControlService.showActionButton('bioTransfer');
		bropRequestDetailsService.getData(sessionId, requestId, approvalId).then(handleResponse, handleError);
	};
	
	/* local functions */
    function handleRequestDataResponse(results) {
        $scope.myData = results;
        $scope.count = results.length;
        if ($scope.count == 0) {
			$scope.hasData = false;
            $('#bioinformatician_view_table').hide();
        } else {
			$scope.hasData = true;
            $('#bioinformatician_view_table').show();
        }
		$scope.$apply();
    }
	
	function getSearchParameters() {
		return {type: method, userId: userId, catDesc: bropConstantsService.getCatItemDesc() };
	}
	
	function handleResponse() {
		$scope.$apply(); 
	}
		
	function handleError(error) {
        alert('ERROR: ' + error);
	}
	
	function getData() {
		var searchParams = getSearchParameters();
		bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService.getData(sessionId, searchParams)
		.then(handleRequestDataResponse, handleError);
	}
	
	/* initialization */
	$('#bioinformatician_view_table').hide();
    $scope.myData = [];
	if ($scope.canView) {
		getData();
	 }
	
	spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "sysapproval_approver", "", function() {  
		getData();
	});	
	
	
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css/><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>dibq</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>DCEG In Bioinformatitian Queue</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var session_id = gs.getSessionToken();
	var userId = gs.getUserID();
	var user = gs.getUser();
	var canView = user.isMemberOf('DCEG_BIOINFORMATIC');

	data.info = {
		userId: userId,
		sessionId: session_id,
		canView: canView
	};	

})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-14 20:58:33</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>2f3f4b9ddb9c1f40f59974131f961933</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DCEG In Bioinformatitian Queue</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_2f3f4b9ddb9c1f40f59974131f961933</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-22 21:55:15</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<brop-panel ng-if="canView && hasData"></brop-panel>]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_06f77151dbd81f40f59974131f96192d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope, spUtil, bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService, bropRequestDetailsService, bropActionControlService, bropConstantsService) {
	/* widget controller */
	var c = this;

	/* data from server */
	var sessionId = c.data.info.sessionId;
	var userId = c.data.info.userId;
	$scope.canView = c.data.info.canView;
	
	/* local variables */
    var method = "chair";
	
	/* scope variables and functions */
	$scope.panelInfo = { 
		tableId: 'chair_view_table',
		panelHeadingId: 'heading_chairViewItems', 
		collapseTarget: 'collapseChairViewItems', 
		panelTitle: 'Proposals Waiting for Chairman Review' 
	};
	
 	$scope.paginationId = "chairViewDataPagination";
	
	$scope.tableColumns = [
		{'name': 'number', 'text': 'BROP ID',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_number'},
		{'name': 'name', 'text': 'Principal Investigator',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'projectName', 'text': 'Project Name',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedBy', 'text': 'Submitted By',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedDate', 'text': 'Submitted Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'stage', 'text': 'Status',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'lastUpdateDate', 'text': 'Last Update Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'actions', 'text': 'Actions',  'sortable': false}
	];
	
	$scope.actions = [ 
		{ 'type': 'button', 'action': 'displayDetails(data.requestId, data.approvalId);', 'text': 'View' },			   
		{ 'type': 'link', 'action': '$sp.do?id=dceg_report_page&sys_id={{data.requestId}}', 'text': 'Export' }	
	];
	
	 $scope.sort=function(keyname){	
			$scope.sortKey = keyname;
			$scope.reverse = !$scope.reverse;
	 };
	
	$scope.displayDetails = function(id, approvalId){
		bropActionControlService.showActionButton('chairman');
		$('#optionDiv').html(bropConstantsService.getBioMemberOption());
		bropRequestDetailsService.getData(sessionId, id, approvalId).then(handleResponse, handleError);
	};	
	
	/* local functions */
    function handleRequestDataResponse(results) {
        $scope.myData = results;
        $scope.count = results.length;
        if ($scope.count == 0) {
			$scope.hasData = false;
            $('#chair_view_table').hide();
        } else {
			$scope.hasData = true;
            $('#chair_view_table').show();
        }
		$scope.$apply();
    }
	
	function getSearchParameters() {
		return {type: method, userId: userId, catDesc: bropConstantsService.getCatItemDesc() };
	}
	
	function handleResponse() {
		$scope.$apply(); 
	}
		
	function handleError(error) {
        alert('ERROR: ' + error);
	}
	
	function getData() {
		var searchParams = getSearchParameters();
		bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService.getData(sessionId, searchParams)
		.then(handleRequestDataResponse, handleError);
	}
	
	/* initialization */
	$('#chair_view_table').hide();
    $scope.myData = [];
	if ($scope.canView) {
		getData();
	 }
	
	spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "sysapproval_approver", "", function() {  
		getData();
	});	
	
	
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css/><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>dwcr</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>DCEG Waiting for Chairman Review</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var session_id = gs.getSessionToken();
	var userId = gs.getUserID();
	var user = gs.getUser();
	var canView = user.isMemberOf('DCEG_CHAIR');

	data.info = {
		userId: userId,
		sessionId: session_id,
		canView: canView
	};	

})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-14 14:37:15</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>06f77151dbd81f40f59974131f96192d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DCEG Waiting for Chairman Review</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_06f77151dbd81f40f59974131f96192d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-22 22:01:09</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<brop-panel ng-if="canView && hasData"></brop-panel>        ]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope, spUtil, bropBioinformaticianTasksService, bropRequestDetailsService, bropActionControlService, bropConstantsService) {
	/* widget controller */
	var c = this;

	/* data from server */
	var sessionId = c.data.info.sessionId;
	var userId = c.data.info.userId;
	$scope.canView = c.data.info.canView;
	
	/* local variables */
	
	/* scope variables and functions */
	$scope.panelInfo = { 
		tableId: 'bioinformatician_task_view_table',
		panelHeadingId: 'heading_bioinformaticianTaskViewItems', 
		collapseTarget: 'collapseBioinformaticainTaskViewItems', 
		panelTitle: 'Bioinformatician Tasks' 
	};
	
 	$scope.paginationId = "bioinformaticianTaskViewDataPagination";
	
	$scope.tableColumns = [
		{'name': 'bropId', 'text': 'BROP ID',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_number'},
		{'name': 'bioInformatician', 'text': 'Bioinformatician',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'name', 'text': 'Principal Investigator',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'projectName', 'text': 'Project Name',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'stage', 'text': 'Status',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'estimate', 'text': 'Estimated Hours',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'actual', 'text': 'Actual Hours',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'actions', 'text': 'Actions',  'sortable': false}
	];
	
	$scope.actions = [ 
		{ 'type': 'button', 'action': 'displayDetails(data.requestId);', 'text': 'View' }
	];
	
	 $scope.sort=function(keyname){	
			$scope.sortKey = keyname;
			$scope.reverse = !$scope.reverse;
	 };
	
	$scope.displayDetails = function(requestId) {
		bropActionControlService.showActionButton('pi');
		bropRequestDetailsService.getData(sessionId, requestId, null).then(handleResponse, handleError);
	};
	
	/* local functions */
    function handleRequestDataResponse(results) {
        $scope.myData = results;
        $scope.count = results.length;
        if ($scope.count == 0) {
			$scope.hasData = false;
            $('#bioinformatician_task_view_table').hide();
        } else {
			$scope.hasData = true;
            $('#bioinformatician_task_view_table').show();
        }
		$scope.$apply();
    }
	
	function handleResponse() {
		$scope.$apply(); 
	}
		
	function handleError(error) {
        alert('ERROR: ' + error);
	}
	
	function getData() {
		bropBioinformaticianTasksService.getData(sessionId)
		.then(handleRequestDataResponse, handleError);
	}
	
	/* initialization */
	$('#bioinformatician_task_view_table').hide();
    $scope.myData = [];
	if ($scope.canView) {
		getData();
	 }
	
	spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "sysapproval_approver", "", function() {  
		getData();
	});	
	
	
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css/><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>dbit</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>DCEG Bioinformatician tasks</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var session_id = gs.getSessionToken();
	var userId = gs.getUserID();
	var user = gs.getUser();
	var canView = user.isMemberOf('DCEG_BIOINFORMATICIAN_TASK');

	data.info = {
		userId: userId,
		sessionId: session_id,
		canView: canView
	};	

})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-15 15:59:12</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>d854db69db5c5f4054d8ff621f961983</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DCEG Bioinformatician tasks</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_d854db69db5c5f4054d8ff621f961983</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-22 21:51:37</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<brop-panel ng-if="canView && hasData"></brop-panel>]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_a99b7651db9c1f40f59974131f9619b7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope, spUtil, bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService, bropRequestDetailsService, bropActionControlService, bropConstantsService) {
    /* widget controller */	
    var c = this;
	
	/* data from server */
  var sessionId = c.data.info.sessionId;
  var userId = c.data.info.userId;
  $scope.canView = c.data.info.canView;
	
	/* local variables */
    var method = "secreatryTransfer";
	
	/* scope variables and functions */
	$scope.panelInfo = { tableId: 'secretary_transfer_view_table', 
						 panelHeadingId: 'heading_transferViewItems', 
						 collapseTarget: 'collapseTransferViewItems', 
						 panelTitle: 'Transferred Proposals Waiting for Executive Secretary Review' 
					   };
	
	$scope.tableColumns = [
		{'name': 'number', 'text': 'BROP ID',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_number'},
		{'name': 'name', 'text': 'Principal Investigator',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'projectName', 'text': 'Project Name',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedBy', 'text': 'Submitted By',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedDate', 'text': 'Submitted Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'stage', 'text': 'Status',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'lastUpdateDate', 'text': 'Last Update Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'actions', 'text': 'Actions',  'sortable': false}
	];

	$scope.paginationId = "transferViewDataPagination";
	
	$scope.actions = [ 
		{ 'type': 'button', 'action': 'displayDetails(data.requestId, data.approvalId);', 'text': 'View' },			   
		{ 'type': 'link', 'action': '$sp.do?id=dceg_report_page&sys_id={{data.requestId}}', 'text': 'Export' }	
	];
	
	$scope.sort = function(keyname) {		
		$scope.sortKey = keyname;
		$scope.reverse = !scope.reverse;
	};	
	
	$scope.displayDetails = function(id, approvalId){
		bropActionControlService.showActionButton('secretaryTransfer');
		$('#optionDiv').html(bropConstantsService.getBioMemberOption());
		bropRequestDetailsService.getData(sessionId, id, approvalId).then(handleResponse, handleError);
	};	
	

	/* local functions */
    function handleRequestDataResponse(results) {
        $scope.myData = results;
        $scope.count = results.length;
        if ($scope.count == 0) {
			$scope.hasData = false;
            $('#secretary_transfer_view_table').hide();
        } else {
			$scope.hasData = true;
            $('#secretary_transfer_view_table').show();
        }
		$scope.$apply();
    }
		
	function getSearchParameters() {
		
		return {type: method, userId: userId, catDesc: bropConstantsService.getCatItemDesc() };
	}
	
	function handleResponse() {
		$scope.$apply(); 
	}
		
	function handleError(error) {
        alert('ERROR: ' + JSON.stringify(error));
  }
	
	function getData() {
		var searchParams = getSearchParameters();
		bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService.getData(sessionId, searchParams)
		.then(handleRequestDataResponse, handleError);
	}
	
	/* initialization */
  $('#secretary_final_view_table').hide();
  $scope.myData = [];
	if ($scope.canView) {
		 getData();
	}
	
	spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "sysapproval_approver", "", function() {  
		getData();
	});	
	
}
]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css/><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id/><internal>false</internal><link/><name>DCEG Waiting Exec Sec Review</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
  var session_id = gs.getSessionToken();
	var userId = gs.getUserID();
	var user = gs.getUser();
	var canView = user.isMemberOf('DCEG_SECRETARY');

	data.info = {
		userId: userId,
		sessionId: session_id,
		canView: canView
	};	
	
})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-14 19:32:40</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>a99b7651db9c1f40f59974131f9619b7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DCEG Waiting Exec Sec Review</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_a99b7651db9c1f40f59974131f9619b7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-22 22:00:30</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<brop-panel ng-if="canView && hasData"></brop-panel>]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_7eb48fd5db9c1f40f59974131f9619b3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope, spUtil, bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService, bropRequestDetailsService, bropActionControlService, bropConstantsService) {
	/* widget controller */
	var c = this;

	/* data from server */
	var sessionId = c.data.info.sessionId;
	var userId = c.data.info.userId;
	$scope.canView = c.data.info.canView;
	
	/* local variables */
    var method = "chairmanReviewed";
	
	/* scope variables and functions */
	$scope.panelInfo = { 
		tableId: 'chairman_reviewed_table',
		panelHeadingId: 'heading_chairmanReviewedItems', 
		collapseTarget: 'collapseChairmanReviewedItems', 
		panelTitle: 'Proposal Reviewed by Chairman' 
	};
	
 	$scope.paginationId = "chairmanReviewedDataPagination";
	
	$scope.tableColumns = [
		{'name': 'number', 'text': 'BROP ID',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_number'},
		{'name': 'name', 'text': 'Principal Investigator',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'projectName', 'text': 'Project Name',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedBy', 'text': 'Submitted By',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedDate', 'text': 'Submitted Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'stage', 'text': 'Status',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'status', 'text': 'Previous Status',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'actions', 'text': 'Actions',  'sortable': false}
	];
	
	$scope.actions = [ 
		{ 'type': 'button', 'action': 'displayDetails(data.requestId, data.approvalId);', 'text': 'View' },			   
		{ 'type': 'link', 'action': '$sp.do?id=dceg_report_page&sys_id={{data.requestId}}', 'text': 'Export' }	
	];
	
	 $scope.sort=function(keyname){	
			$scope.sortKey = keyname;
			$scope.reverse = !$scope.reverse;
	 };
	
	$scope.displayDetails = function(id, approvalId){
		bropActionControlService.showActionButton('pi');
		bropRequestDetailsService.getData(sessionId, id, approvalId).then(handleResponse, handleError);
	};	
	
	/* local functions */
    function handleRequestDataResponse(results) {
        $scope.myData = results;
        $scope.count = results.length;
        if ($scope.count == 0) {
			$scope.hasData = false;
            $('#chairman_reviewed_table').hide();
        } else {
			$scope.hasData = true;
            $('#chairman_reviewed_table').show();
        }
		$scope.$apply();
    }
	
	function getSearchParameters() {
		return {type: method, userId: userId, catDesc: bropConstantsService.getCatItemDesc() };
	}
	
	function handleResponse() {
		$scope.$apply(); 
	}
		
	function handleError(error) {
        alert('ERROR: ' + JSON.stringify(error));
	}
	
	function getData() {
		var searchParams = getSearchParameters();
		bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService.getData(sessionId, searchParams)
		.then(handleRequestDataResponse, handleError);
	}
	
	/* initialization */
	$('#chairman_reviewed_table').hide();
    $scope.myData = [];
	if ($scope.canView) {
		getData();
	 }
	
	spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "sysapproval_approver", "", function() {  
		getData();
	});	
	
	
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css/><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>drdbc</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>DCEG Reviewed By Chairman</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var session_id = gs.getSessionToken();
	var userId = gs.getUserID();
	var user = gs.getUser();
	var canView = user.isMemberOf('DCEG_CHAIR');

	data.info = {
		userId: userId,
		sessionId: session_id,
		canView: canView
	};	

})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-14 20:12:38</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>7eb48fd5db9c1f40f59974131f9619b3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DCEG Reviewed By Chairman</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_7eb48fd5db9c1f40f59974131f9619b3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-22 21:56:41</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<brop-panel ng-if="canView && hasData"></brop-panel>        ]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_d2906424db801340f59974131f961924
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="DELETE"><active>true</active><description>loads request details by ID</description><global>false</global><name>loadBropRequestDetails</name><script><![CDATA[function loadRequestDetails(id, id2){
	$('#commentLength').val('0');
	cleanApprovalError();
	$.ajax({
		dataType: "json",
		type: "GET",
		url: "/api/naci/getdata/getRequestDetailsById",
		beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
			data: {sysId: id},
				async: false,
				success: function(data){
					var obj = data.result[0];
					for(var i = 0; i < textFields.length; i++) {
						var tfValue = obj[textFields[i]];
						if(textFields[i].indexOf('Date') > 0){
							tfValue = getConvertedValue(tfValue, "1");
						}
						$('#'+textFields[i]+"1").html(tfValue);
					}
					for(var k = 0; k < checkboxs.length; k++){
						var value = obj[checkboxs[k]];
						if(value == 'true'){
							$('#' + checkboxs[k] + "1").prop('checked', 'cheked');
						}
					}
					$('#hideRequestId').val(id);
					$('#hideApprovalId').val(id2);  //approve, reject or fast track action will use this id for further process.
					var comments = obj['comments'];
					$('#commentLength').val(comments.length);
					if(comments != null && comments.length > 5){
						comments = parse(comments);
						$('#commentReviewId1').html(comments);
					}else{
						$('#commets').hide();
					}
					
					$('#proposalDetail').modal('show');
					
				},
				error: function(data){
					alert("ERROR");
				}
			});
		}]]></script><script_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-30 14:08:27</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>d2906424db801340f59974131f961924</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>loadBropRequestDetails</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_d2906424db801340f59974131f961924</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-30 14:08:27</sys_updated_on><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
